1.content: Who are you going to be in the world of Zootopia?
1.title: Character Selection 1

11.content: You're walking down the street alone. It's nighttime, but not too late. Maybe...eight o' clock. You shrug the time off. Doesn't matter. Judy Hopps has already gone home by now, and you're just finishing up your rounds. You round a corner, and that's it. You're done for today. You sigh. You start to head home, when an idea pops into your head
11.title: Nick Wilde

111.content:
You reach down and rub your thin stomach, paws pressing against the thick fabric of your police uniform and onto the soft fur of your belly. You feel so hungry, so very hungry, and the flashes of predatory thoughts dance into your mind.

Perhaps it's some lingering effect of being exposed to the night howler laboratory that's just now sinking into your mind, but you can't get the idea of sweet, delicious predation out of your head. You want to swallow down someone and feel them squirm in your belly.

Looking at a street sign, you turn to head towards
111.title: Vore someone

She's not home, but her noisy neighbors are...
1111.content:
Up the stairs to the floor of Judy's apartment, you keep rubbing at your fox stomach, feeling the fur of it move gently on your paw as it hungers, and imagining it feeling full with something moving inside.

Knocking on her door, you find...
1111.title: Judy's apartment

choices: "I was afraid you'd eat me." (Eat her, unwilling)
"I'd like to see you eat someone..." (She helps you vore someone)
11111.content:
"Hey there foxy," says Judy as she hugs your midsection. Her head feels warm against your chest, even through your clothes. "Mmmm," she says, leaning into the hug. "What brings you around here?"

Your stomach rumbles loud enough for her to feel, and she leans out of the hug, still holding you, looking down at your body almost impressed. "Wow, heh, you must be hungry. I hope you didn't come by thinking I would cook for you."

"Actually, I was interested in seeing if you wanted to get something to eat, in a way," you say, allowing the double meanings to syrup over your voice. Your eyebrows curve in a clever, vulpine smirk as you grab onto your shoulders.

"Ah, heh..." you see her instinctual rabbit nerves crook her smile, make her shake a little. "Good thing you never actually got hit with that savage predator formula, huh? Or else you'd be looking to put me in there..." She pats your stomach and it responds to her touch. "Wow, it's almost like it wants me... in... there,"

"Oh? Are you suggesting something?"

"Well, if I'm honest..." said Judy, looking away...
11111.title: She's home, and greets you warmly

111111.content: Suddenly you rip off her cloths, grab her by the waist, pick up your tasty victim and stuff her head first into your mouth. You let her sink down your throat, Judy moaning as you lick her round, furry breasts. You swallowed the last of the bunny, stomach expanded once Judy was completely deposited into your gut. You moaned in pleasure as you felt your victim squirm inside your belly. "Oh yes Judy, keep squirming cause you’re not going anywhere.”

1111112.title: Digest her

choices: Nick declines. He wanted his prey to unwilling.
111112.content:
"To be blunt, I want you to eat me Nick." Judy said nervously sitting down on her bed. "I've just always been curious and I'd like you to do it. I'd like you to be the one who eats me because I trust you"

Nick stood there shocked. He had originally came over to do just that, but now she was offering herself up. "I don't know what to say" Nick stuttered out as he move next to her. "You don't need to say anything Nick" Judy reassured him, "If you don't want to that's Ok."

Judy pointed to the bathroom. "There is experimental drug to let me reform in the bathroom" She said with a shaky voice. " I don't know if it will work but it would ease your mind a bit if you digested me"
111112.title: "I'm kind of... curious..." (Eat he...

choices: They Decide to have Sex first
They get Interrupted Before they get Started - Chief Bogo has a Case for Them
1111121.content:
"Alright," said Nick. "I mean, I'll be honest, the thought of eating you was on my mind, but I just didn't want to, well, you know."

"Scare me away if I knew that you were thinking about it," said Judy. "It's alright. I mean, the only reason I'm asking you is because I trust you to be able to do everything you can to get me out if something goes wrong."

"I'll do my best," said Nick. "That being said, why are you asking me about this? I mean, we could do some role-playing instead."

"Well, it's like this - Chief Bogo, due to some pressure from Mayor Lionheart, is thinking of hiring rodent officers to patrol Little Rodentia, and to sneak around inside of peoples' homes when we are investigating them," said Judy. "Problem is, what if they encounter a predatory criminal who, shall we say, doesn't eat just fish and insects, and decides to swallow them whole to silence them. Thus some researchers and the like have been working on this drug that will let someone who takes it survive a trip through the digestive system."

Nick chuckled. "That's Buffalo-Butt for you - chews you out when you screw up, but has your back whenever you're in trouble. And since you're paired up with a predator, they decided to use you as the lab rat, as it were."

"Well, I don't think that laboratory rats would like it if you put it quite like that," said Judy. "I think they'd prefer the term Test Bunny. Like I said, this drug could be quite useful in the field."

Nick grinned. "Actually, if this works, it could have other recreational applications."

"Like with your friends at that nudest club?" Judy asked.

"More than just them," said Nick. "Think about it - I can't be the only predator with thoughts of eating someone, and you can't be the only prey with thoughts of being eaten. A savvy business-mammal could make a lot of money if they pitched the idea just right."

Judy grinned. "Finnick?"

"Well, him and Duke Weasleton," said Nick. "Finnick because he'd be able to make smaller prey mammals feel at ease about being eaten. Duke, well, let's face it, lots of people want to eat him."

Judy chuckled. "Maybe we should test the drug on him."

"Good idea."

Judy started to take her clothes off.

"What are you doing?"

"I don't want my clothes to get ruined."

"In that case-" Nick also started to take his clothes off.

Soon enough, the pair were naked, and they were looking at each other, not quite sure if it was hunger, or lust, they had in their eyes, or both.
1111121.title: Nick agrees to eat her.

11111211.content:
Judy giggles Nervously putting one leg in front of the other to hide her slit. she crossed her arms over her chest for the same reason. Nick chuckled. "you do that every time, Carrots."


"what?"

"cover up." Nick said with a chuckle as they stepped into the bath room.

"so, its embarrassing." Judy replied stepping in behind him.

"Bunnies." Nick shook his head, "we've had sex a dozen times and still you hide." Judy rolled her eyes as Nick opened the medicine cabinet. there were many bottles. headache pills, a stomach pill, some vitamins and a strange blue medical bottle.
11111211.title: They Test the Drug

choices: They have a bit of fun as Nick swallows Judy
111112111.content:
Nick took out the blue bottle. "Is this the one?"

"It is," said Judy, as she took the bottle. She opened it, took out a pill, and swallowed it.

"Are you sure about this?" Nick asked.

"I'm pretty sure," said Judy. "If this works, we'll get a nice bonus in our paychecks. Easily ten thousand apiece."

Nick's eyes widened. "Just for one time?"

Judy chuckled. "More than what you normally made selling Pawsicles."

"I did make two hundred per day," said Nick. "Um, what if something went wrong, and you don't make it?"

"My family would get a very high insurance payout," said Judy. "Ten million. Story would be that I got involved in a very dangerous situation, where I suffered a lot of terrible injuries, and that you were the one that made the identification., but my remains were such that it was best that my family didn't see them."

"I see," said Nick. "Given what would happen, probably be a good idea that they didn't see that you had turned into fox poop."

"That being said, I trust you to get me out, should something happen," said Judy.

Nick smiled. "I'll do my best."
111112111.title: Give Judy the real pill.

choices: Judy realizes what’s happening and attempts to escape!
Judy doesn’t notice anything wrong and rests...
111112112.content:
Nick paused, a devious idea popping into his head.

Before he grabbed a pill, he turned to the bunny on the bed.

"Are you sure about this?" Nick asked.

"I'm pretty sure," said Judy. "If this works, we’ll be paid for being a test trial for the drug!” She explained.

“That does sound enticing...” Nick notes. “And um... if it doesn’t work?”

Judy looked away, gulping back some fear. “W-Well... I’m sure my family would be compensated for my loss. Probably pay them a lot and throw up a cover story about a dangerous shoot out, one where my body would be best left unseen.” She shook her head, her nervousness starting to show. “B-But I know you won’t let that happen!”

“I promise.” Nick smiled.However, there was an evil glint to the fox’s smile. He reached over to the vitamin bottle and popped out one of the pills, leaving the real pill behind as he gave it to the bunny, who eagerly swallowed it.

“Let’s do this~” Judy smiled as the fox licked his lips, mentally greeting his partner goodbye for good.

He grabbed her sides before opening his mouth, the bunny squealing in excitement as he shoved her head right into his maw.

An explosion of flavor rocked the fox’s taste buds as he began swallowing the bunny down, Judy kicking her legs out as she slid down Nick’s throat.

The bunny didn’t make for a hard pill to swallow as Nick gulped her down with one last swallow, his belly expanding to contain the smaller bunny.

“Ah.. BWOOOURP!” He belched, some fur flying out as he chuckled. He heard Judy’s muffled words from within his belly, but ignored it as he patted his bulging gut.

“See ya later, Carrots~ You just got hustled~” He laughed evilly as he threw a blanket over his body and dozed off...
111112112.title: Give Judy a fake pill.

choices: Skip to Nick waking up the next day
1111121122.content:
As it turned out, Judy had some kind of feeling that Nick would not have given her the real pill.
And if she had to be honest... she didn't mind at all.
Apparently, she had those dreams of being eaten by Nick lately, and now... it's as if her dream came true.
And now, there she was, digesting away within Nick's belly.
She could feel Nick rubbing his belly with both paws, making out him purring as his stomach began the digestion process.
1111121122.title: Judy doesn’t notice anything wrong and rests...

choices: Nick decides on heading to Bunnyborrow (more prey).
Nick decides on feasting on more prey.
11111211222.content:
The next morning, Nick woke up and saw... that his belly was rather pudgy.
He gently rubbed it with a smirk, thinking back on how tasty Judy was when she went down his throat.
11111211222.title: Skip to Nick waking up the next day

choices: "Well, I think being on top might be safer."
Judy's neighbors interrupt by pounding on the wall and yelling
11111212.content:
Judy looked away with a nervous blush. "Um, you look good, Nick."

"I could say the same about yourself." Nick chuckled nervously as he looked away. "You know, I was thinking - what if something went wrong? What if you didn't make it? I mean, it would be nice if we did something so that I could remember you by?"

"Like what?" Judy asked.

"Well, you know how rabbits are with, um, multiplication," said Nick. "I was wondering if you were, um, any good at math?"

Judy chuckled. "I do have 275 brothers and sisters, and many more nieces and nephews." She looked at Nick. "Are you saying that you want to have sex with me?"

Nick grinned. "Yes."

Judy grinned back. "I was wondering if you'd ever ask me that question." She laid down on the bed, and spread her legs open. "Well, what are you waiting for? A written invitation?"

Nick got on the bed, and started to kiss her. "Tell me, do you know what they say about foxes?"

"No. What do they say about foxes?"

"We're bigger than we appear to be."

"In that case, let's see how big you really are, sly fox."

"Just on thing: Do you want to be on top, or are you okay being on the bottom?"
11111212.title: They Decide to have Sex first

choices: They get a call from Chief Bogo
They get a call from Judy's Parents
111112123.content:
Judy was just about to answer when suddenly....

"Could you hurry up in there! The suspense is killing me!"

"Why don't you leave them alone? It's obviously their fist time doing this!"

"You shut up!"

"No, you shut up!"

That was when the sound of fighting was heard inside of the room.

Nick looked back down at Judy, who groaned in annoyance.

"I should get a better apartment."

"That might be a good idea. Those two could ruin your sex life."

"They probably could." Judy looked up at Nick. "I hope they haven't ruined the mood for you."

Nick grinned. "Not at all."
111112123.title: Annoying Neighbors

choices: "You have two hours to get to the Precinct." (it doesn't even take ten minutes)
1111121232.content:
Nick kissed Judy, and was about to start showing her what a male fox could do when Judy's phone went off.

"Terrible timing," the fox said, as the rabbit reached for the phone.

Judy looked at the phone, and looked at Nick. "It's Chief Bogo," she hissed. "We can't let him see us like this!"

"Well, at least it wasn't your parents," said Nick, as he got off of her, and sat on the edge of the bed. "I mean, we could explain to him the reason you're naked is because the two of us were about to test that drug, and you didn't want your clothes to get ruined by stomach acid."

"What about you?" Judy asked, the phone still ringing.

Nick grinned. "Because I didn't want you to stretch out my clothes when I swallowed you."

Judy chuckled. "Good one, sly fox."

Nick kissed her again. "Better answer it."

Judy answered her phone. "Chief Bogo?"

"Hopps! I know it's late, but I need you here at the precinct, and I need you to get a hold of Wilde," the water buffalo said. He looked at her through his phone's camera. "Um, you seem to be under-dressed, Judy. Is there something going on I should know about?"

"Well, not exactly," Judy said, with a nervous chuckle. "Um, you see, Nick is here, and we were about to test that drug that you gave me and-"

"I get the picture," said Chief Bogo.
1111121232.title: They get a call from Chief Bogo

11111212322.content:
"I'll give you two hours to get here," said Chief Bogo. "This is important." He hung up.

"Two hours?" Judy asked. "It doesn't take that long to get there. Maybe ten minutes, at most, depending on traffic."

Nick chuckled. "Like I said - Buffalo Butt chews you out when you mess up, but he's got your back when you need help, and we sure did need the time it will take to get dressed, let alone drive back to the precinct."

"But, it only takes-"

"We've got a little over an hour and a half before we need to get going," Nick said, as he took the phone, and shut it off. "Let's not waste it, or get interrupted."

Judy grinned as she realized what Nick meant about Bogo giving them extra time to get to the Precinct. "I agree." She then kissed Nick. "Time for some fun."
11111212322.title: Two Hours For Fun

choices: The Crime was in Little Rodentia, and everyone else is too big for there
The Crime involves Nick's Former Partner-in-Crime Finnick somehow
The Crime involves Mr. Big, and you're the only officers he trusts to talk to
111112123222.content:
Nick had enjoyed himself. Sure he'd had sex with the odd vixen, here and there, but he'd never did it with a rabbit, although he did have a moment of worry when his maleness started to swell inside of Judy, and he saw that she was in pain, but she told him not to pull out. So, he'd held her close, and kept kissing her. Of course, it seemed that Judy wasn't the innocent farmer's daughter she made herself out to be, especially when she placed her hand between their legs, and gave his maleness a teasing squeeze, among other things. He had grinned at that, especially when she admitted to having done the odd buck herself, although they'd always wore a condom, so that she didn't get pregnant, especially since there was always that chance that they might be related.... but enough about that sort of thing - she'd enjoyed herself as well.

Eventually, Nick's maleness reduced, and he was able to slip out of her. "Well, that was nice," he said, as he got off of her.

"Nice?" Judy asked. "I think you enjoyed it."

Nick chuckled. "Yeah, I did."

"Next time though, let's get some lubricant," said Judy. "You were a little bigger than what I thought you'd be."

Nick smiled. "I told you. Oh, and condoms."

"I doubt we need to worry about those," said Judy. "It's not like a fox and a rabbit could have kits together."

"True, but there's always those STDs that might not affect you, but could affect someone of another species," said Nick.

"Perhaps, but the doctor says that I'm clean," said Judy. "You?"

Nick chuckled. "I'm good there."

Judy grabbed him, and kissed him again. "Then don't worry about it."

Nick smiled. "Still, it always pays to be prepared."

"Right," Judy said, as she got off of the bed. Then, she groaned. She grinned nervously as she looked at Nick. "Bigger than what I'm used to."

Nick chuckled. "Going to shower off?"

"Something like that."

Nick stood up up. "Let me help you."

A little while later, the two were in the shower, and the hot water put off a lot of steam.....



Two hours later, they pair arrived at the station.

"I hope no one asks too many questions," said Judy.

"The shower should have taken care of our respective scents, so they shouldn't figure out too quickly that we had sex with each other," said Nick. "Although if we do this again, I'd advise getting separate soaps, shampoos, and conditioners, with different scents - they'll know we used the same shower since we used the exact same soaps and shampoos and conditioners."

"I suppose that would be a good idea," said Judy.

"Now, let's see what Buffalo-Butt wanted us for," said Nick.

That was when the door to the precinct opened, and the pair found Chief Bogo looking at them, his arms crossed in front of him. "Was there a scented rain shower between here and your apartment Judy?" He looked over at Nick. "Or was my big butt in the way?"

The pair chuckled nervously. "Well, you said that-"

"I know what I said," said Chief Bogo. He looked at his watch. "Two hours, and not a minute more. You're lucky. Get inside."

"So, what's the issue?" Judy asked. "I mean, what was so important that you needed me and Nick? There's other officers you could have called."

"I would have sent for someone else, but I figured you'd be best for the case, due to the fact that you could more easily work it than any of my other officers, or at least be our liaison on the case," said Bogo.

"So, what's the case?" Nick asked.

Bogo looked at the pair. "Let's put it this way..."
111112123222.title: Afterwards

choices: A place I'm the Landlord for was robbed
One of my friends was abducted
I've been hearing some disturbing rumors involving a certain sheep
1111121232223.content:
"It seems that one of the local mob bosses is the victim of a crime," said Chief Bogo. "Specifically, the one from Tundratown."

"Wait, are we talking about an Arctic shrew with polar bear guards?" Nick asked. "Specifically, goes by the name Mr. Big?"

"That would be one of the names he uses," said Chief Bogo. "I take it you know him."

"I know everybody," said Nick. "And yes, me and Judy have had some dealings with him."

"And that's why he wants to talk to you," said Chief Bogo. "He only wants to talk to those who aren't thinking about arresting him."

"Is there a warrant for his arrest?" Judy asked.

"Nothing outstanding, and nothing we can prove," said Chief Bogo. "Then again, we haven't had officers who could go into Little Rodentia without causing more damage than the known criminals living in that area. With you two, all we have to do is give you the address, and you can walk over, and pick them up. I doubt he wants that sort of thing to occur."

"Makes sense," said Nick.

"By the way, I'm going to give the pair of you some advice," said Chief Bogo. "When you clock off after you're done here, head to the pharmacy on Stripe and 7th. They might have a few things you could use."

"Like what?" Judy asked.

"Different scented soaps, shampoos, and conditioners for a start," said Chief Bogo. "Also, they have some stuff that helps you if your partner is, shall we say, not of your species, especially where size is concerned."

"What do you mean?" Nick asked.

"Let's put it this way, sometimes a small female antelope has a thing for a large male elephant, but needs something for him to get inside of her, and not cause too much pain," said Chief Bogo. "I know you two know what I'm talking about, especially if the way Hopps has been walking is any indication."

The pair chuckled nervously. "Got you Chief."

"I'm glad you do," Chief Bogo said. "Tell the owner I said 'Hi'. I, um, saved his place from a robbery attempt back when I was a rookie, and as a result, police officers get a discount of 10%."

"Something tells me it was more than just that," said Nick. "Let me guess, it has to do with the elephant and the antelope."

Chief Bogo looked at Nick. "Let's put it this way - my wife and I have an open marriage, and there are times she likes a bigger male, and there are times I like a small female, and sometimes knowing an elephant and an antelope who are really good friends, tends to help out there. Any questions?"

"We're good," said Judy, as she grabbed Nick's hand. "Let's get going. Let's see what Mr. Big needs us for."



A little while later, Nick and Judy were in a room, and on the other side of it was Mr. Big, who was in a chair on a table, and his polar bear guard Koslov, who was standing behind him.

"So, how are you doing, Mr. Big?" Judy asked. "How's Fru-Fru and Little Judy?"

Mr. Big smiled. "They're doing just fine. Little Judy is growing nicely, and Fru-Fru is doing well."

"That's good to hear," said Judy.

"I, on the other hand, am not doing so well," said Mr. Big.

"What's wrong?" Nick asked.

"Let's put it this way....
1111121232223.title: The Crime involves Mr. Big, and you're the ...

11111212322233.content:
"I've been hearing some disturbing rumors about a certain sheep you helped put away," said Mr. Big.

"Are you talking about Bellweather?" Judy asked.

Mr. Big nodded. "The very ewe herself. Seems she's got quite the following, and it seems they plan to get her out of prison."

"How do you know this?" Judy asked.

"You might say that I'm the landlord of a number of places, and I provide protection for plenty more," said Mr. Big. "After all, it's not like there's a lot of police officers who can safely go into certain areas without causing more damage than the criminals."

"Chief Bogo said something similar about us," said Judy.

Mr. Big grinned. "Strange minds think alike. Oh, and I have some useful information for you. Kodlov. The list, if you would?"

The polar bear got out a sheet of paper, and placed it on the table.

Judy and Nick looked at the paper. "What are these names for?"

"It seems that there are a number of rodents who wish to become police officers and I have you two to thank for this," said Mr. Big. "I've done some of the legwork for you, and sorted out those with few to no crimes in their pasts, and minimal connections to organized crime families, in that they are not part of, or related to anyone part of, the crime families, and what crimes they have committed are minor offences that wouldn't prevent them from being police officers."

"Why would you help us out with that?" Judy asked.

"Because I owe you for saving my daughter, and Mr. Otterton, to say nothing about stopping Bellweather's plot, which would have affected a number of people I know." The shrew looked up at his guard, before looking back at the pair. "Besides, when there's officers who can walk around Little Rodentia, it pays to not be seen as an enemy of them."

Nick chuckled. "Good point. You wouldn't want them to show up while you're conduction a business discussion with someone who displeased you."

"I'm smart enough not do do something beyond say, giving the guy an icy bath to help them clear their mind about a situation," said Mr. Big.

"You could get charged with Assault and Battery if you do such things," said Judy. "Also, you know that Fru-Fru doesn't like you doing such things."

"And isn't it a good thing that Koslov is a lawyer?" Mr. Big asked, with a grin. "Besides, I was speaking hypothetically."

"So, just what are Bellweather's followers planning to do?" Judy asked.

"Getting her out of prison, that much I know," said Mr. Big. "Beyond that, I'm not sure. They close their mouths around predators, but they might open them up around prey-types."

"Got any locations?" Judy asked.

Mr. Big nodded. "Koslov, hand them the other list."

The polar bear placed another sheet of paper on the table.

Judy and Nick looked at the paper.

"You're very generous," said Judy. "Something tells me that you want something."

"Nothing major, but I would appreciate it if your undercover officers were smart enough to, shall we say, look the other way when they look for these people at the places I own," said Mr. Big. "It would be stupid if they outed themselves as police, unless they decided to go undercover as a corrupt officer, if you get my drift. After all, having an officer on the take might prove useful to a group like Bellweather's. That being said, Judy, I'd advise you not to be the one to investigate, as you and Nick are too well-known."

"Alright," said Judy. "I'll go tell Chief Bogo."

She got out of her chair, and walked out of the room.

Mr. Big watched. "Did she hurt herself?"

Nick chuckled nervously. "Not exactly. She had some help, but it wasn't on purpose or anything intentionally harmful, or anything like that. It was one of those spur of the moment things and-"

He soon saw Mr. Big looking at him, and there was a huge grin on the shrew's face.

"Let me guess, you're bigger than what she's used to?"

"Something like that."

Mr. Big nodded. "I've had the opposite problem in the past, especially when the female was much larger than I was. I know of a pharmacy on Stripe and 7th that might help you."

"Funny. Chief Bogo said the same about that place being able to help us," said Nick.

"I thought I'd seen him in there before," said Mr. Big. "Anyways, you two take care. Koslov."

The polar bear picked the shrew up.

"One moment," said Nick. "Would you happen to be the sort that likes to Role Play, say in Predator-Prey type games?"

"No, but I know of those who are," said Mr. Big. "Would you like to know of a few clubs to go to?"

"I already know about those," said Nick. "However, there might be something that might allow said Role Playing to go further."

"I'm listening."

"Well, it seems that you weren't the only one thinking about getting rodents to join the police force," said Nick. "The problem is what if the officer encountered a predatory criminal who decided to dispose of them by swallowing them."

"I can see where that would be a concern," said Mr. Big. "What does this have to do with Predator-Prey Role Plays?"

"Well, some scientists have made a pill that, when taken, can allow the person who took it to survive the trip through the digestive system," said Nick. "Me and Judy were about to test it out when we got distracted."

Mr. Big chuckled. "I see. And I can see a few business possibilities. Let me know if it works. Might be a good way to make money."

"Might be useful for other things as well," said Nick.

Mr. Big grinned. "I have no idea what you are talking about."

Nick grinned right back. "I'm sure you don't."

"See you later, Nick." The polar bear and the shrew left the room.

Nick started to chuckle as Judy came in.

"What's so funny?" the rabbit asked.

"Oh, I told him about the pill," the fox said. "I can think of a few possibilities he might use it for, both legal and otherwise."

"I can think of a few people he might try them on," said Judy. "Especially a certain weasel."

"Chief Bogo got the info?" Nick asked.

"Yes, and we can leave now," said Judy.

"Good," said Nick. "Got another recommendation for that pharmacy; seems Mr. Big likes to go there at times."

Judy chuckled. "We might have to check it out."

"Or, we could just go to your place, and test out that pill."

"Or, we could go to this restaurant that's open for nocturnal types," Judy suggested.

"That would be nice."
11111212322233.title: Rumors and Information

choices: The pair pay for their purchases and leave
The pair see some Interesting Books
Someone decided to rob the place
111112123222331.content:
Judy and Nick found themselves at the pharmacy on Stripe and 7th. At first glance, it seemed like the usual pharmacy; generic versions of painkillers, anti-itch creams, anti-flea powders, deworming tablets, and other such things, not to mention soaps, shampoos, and conditioners. Then, there was that section that wasn't too-well advertised, which had condoms and morning-after pills.

Nick picked up a box of Fox Condoms. "Well, I see they're well stocked."

"I think those ones might be a little small for you," said Judy. She pointed at a box above them. "That might be more your size."

Nick looked up, and grinned. "Elephant? I know I'm big, but I'm not that big."

Judy kept looking. "Well, where is something that might help me out?"

"Need help with something?"

Nick and Judy found themselves looking at a yak.

"Why yes, me and my friend are trying to find something that will help us out later," said Nick.

"You know, for when we, um, you know," Judy said, nervously.

"I know a lot of 'You knows'," said the yak. "I know that you'll need this." He handed Judy a small box.

Judy looked at it. "Is it that obvious?"

"Saw it on the monitor," the yak said. "You were limping, somewhat. It will help with the pain your boyfriend gave you." He looked at the shelf. "That being said, if you do decide to do it again, I recommend this." He grabbed another box, and gave it to the pair. "Makes things work much smoother, especially when you haven't had much practice, and it's safe if ingested."

"Ingested?" Judy asked.

"In case you like doing Oral after doing it the regular style, or if you're the sort that likes to lick Anus after doing it Anally," the yak said.

"Um, a little more than what I wanted to know," said Judy.

"Don't knock it until you try it," the yak said.

"Nice to know," said Nick. "Especially for later." He nudged Judy.

"Oh, right," said Judy. "Especially for later."

1111121232223312.content:
Just then, Nick spotted something. "No way! You sell these?"

"What?" Judy asked.

Nick pointed to a shelf filled with magazines, all of which had "Family Protection" covers on them.

"What is it?" Judy asked. "Pornography?"

"No, but I can see how those Moral Guardian types would mistake them for it," the yak said. "I just put the protection covers on to protect my tail from the more extreme ones. You interested?"

"Might be," said Nick. "Got any that might apply to us?"

"Maybe," the yak said as he walked over to the shelf. "I carry a wide selection. Let's see - Elephants and Hippos, no. Giraffes and Lions, no. Cattle and Horses, no. Ah! Foxes and Rabbits." He pulled out a magazine, and handed it to Nick.

Judy looked at the magazine, and looked at Nick. "Seriously? You read these?"

"Well, I've skimmed through the odd issue or two that I found in the trash can," said Nick. "Gives you ideas." He opened the magazine, and started flipping through the pages. "Well, here's an interesting one."

Judy found herself looking. Her eyes bulged as she looked at the pictures, which were professionally made sketches. She'd never look at a carrot quite the same way again.

"These Sexual Role-play magazines are quite popular," the yak said. "You'd be surprised to know who buys them."

"Does Gazelle buy the Gazelle and Tiger issues?" Nick asked.

"No, but her background dancers do, along with the Tiger and Tiger issues," said the yak. "Don't ask me which is the one they really read, and which is the cover purchase though, because it's always a different background dancer that makes the purchase, and they pay in cash."

"Makes sense," said Nick. "Be an interesting story to find out which theory is true."

"Which theory?" Judy asked.

"There was a rumor a while back that at least two of the tigers were a gay couple, and it was published in the tabloids," said Nick. "Gazelle sued them over the story, claiming they had no right to publish such hurtful things about her friends."

"Well, she is protective of those she cares about," said Judy. "I mean, she was at a number of those Predator-Prey Peace rallies and all that."

"That, and that particular tabloid is always filled with garbage anyways," said Nick.

"Mayor Lionheart used to get the Lion and Sheep issue every now and then, but I don't think he ever tried anything out," said the yak. "Someone who was serious tends to get an issue every week, but then you have those who are interested, but don't really act on them."

"He'd come here to buy one?" Judy asked.

"No, but his bodyguards would, and every so often, one of the issues they'd get would be the Lion and Sheep one," said the yak. "Bellweather never made any purchases during her time as Mayor, so it's obvious she wasn't into him that way."

"She did frame him you know," said Judy.

"Yeah, and that whole Anti-Predator thing really backfired on her in the end," said Nick. "Say, does Mr. Big buy the Arctic Shrew and Polar Bear issue, or his guards at any rate?"

"Every now and then," said the yak.

"So, do you carry every issue?" Judy asked.

"I don't have the space to show all of them here, but I have them in the back, along with back-issues," said the yak. "And if I don't have them, I can order them."

"Good to know," said Nick. "Might try some of these things."

"So, are you ready for your purchase, or is there something else you're interested in?" the yak asked.

"In that case, Officer Bunny, that item I gave you, what you want to do is rub it around the affected area," said the yak. "Like I said, it will help to sooth the pain. Also, it can be taken, not only vaginally, but orally and anally as well."

"So, it's safe if ingested?" Judy asked, as she looked at the box.

I remember one time, this elk came in with an injury to his genitalia - I asked him if a tiger bit him during some sexual foreplay, while I applied some gauze to slow the bleeding until the paramedics arrived. He told me that I was wrong but I showed him the orange and black fur, describe exactly what would have happened for how such an injury could occur, and he then told me that I was correct about the species, about what they were doing, and even the part of the game that went wrong."

"Apparently, they had applied too much pressure too fast, which resulted in the elk needing surgery, and the tiger needing to vomit something else up, and washing out their mouth."

"Luckily, the doctors were able to reattach it, although it took a few months to be fully functional again," the yak said. "They don't play that game any more though."

"Okay," said Judy, nervously. "Let's pay up, and get going."

It looked much more comfortable than the thing with the carrot. "Okay. That one I might be willing to try."

Judy grinned and said.....

"I think it would be best if we tested out that pill," said Judy. "Unless you're nervous about doing it."

"I'd be lying if I said I wasn't worried about it," said Nick. "I mean, what if the worst comes to fruition, and you become nothing more than fox fat?"

Judy smiled. "That part has been figured out. Chief Bogo has agreed to see to it that my family gets five million dollars, as part of an Employment Life Insurance Policy, and that I was killed in the line of duty, and sadly, my body was too badly damaged to let people see it."

"Well, given what you'd be turned into, it would be too badly damaged to let people see it," said Nick, with a chuckle.

Judy then kissed Nick. "I know you love me."

Nick kissed her right back. "If this works, I'm going to show you exactly how much I love you."

Judy chuckled. "You can do whatever you want, if this works."

The pair then carefully helped the other get out of their clothes, kissing and holding each other the whole time.

Judy then took a glass of water and the pill, and took it. "This should keep me safe for the next twelve hours."

"I hope it works," Nick said, as he kissed her one last time.

Nick patted his belly. "You be careful in there."

When Nick woke up.....

What woke Nick up was the touch of a paw on his shoulder. He blinked twice to make sure he wasn't dreaming. "Judy?"

The rabbit smiled. "It's me."

The fox looked at his stomach, before looking back at her. "I won't ask the how, exactly, although I didn't feel you come out."

"Let's just say that you didn't feel me come out, because you lost the sense of feeling lower down as I made my way out, and you regained it afterwards," said Judy. "The pill also helps with flexibility, in a couple of ways."

Nick carefully sat up, only to find he didn't have much strength to stand. "Is that one of the side effects?"

"Size of prey versus size of predator is a factor," said Judy. "It might take you another hour to be able to walk properly. But if a mouse got swallowed by a bear, the bear wouldn't feel much energy loss when the mouse escaped."

Nick leaned forward, and sniffed. "And is another side effect that you'll smell like me afterwards?"

"Most people don't bother to track down their own scent," said Judy. "Buys time for the prey to escape the place the predator lives at. Luckily, the pill also helps to keep them clean as well."

Nick chuckled. "Good to know." He laid back down. "So, what now?"

Judy grinned. "That's simple...."

"We can sleep for a few hours," Judy said, as she crawled into the bed. "We did have to clock in a little early after all, and you're in no shape to work now."

Nick smiled. "You're right about that. I still feel tired."

Judy snuggled up to him. "Did you enjoy it?"

"I'd be lying if I said I didn't," said Nick.

Judy kissed him. "I enjoyed it as well."

Nick chuckled. "Good to know."

"I informed Chief Bogo that the test was a success, and your paycheck, as well as mine, will be quite a bit bigger this week," said Judy.

"How much?" Nick asked.

"Six thousand dollars."

"Six thousand?"

"Like I said, he was feeling pressure from the Mayor, and those scientists came to him with the drug," said Judy. "I mean, I'd been having thoughts ever since the incident with Bellweather, but he came to me, and asked for my help with this matter."

Nick held Judy to him. "I'm glad that you trust me."

"Good to know," said Judy.



Some hours later, the two were on patrol when Clawhouser came on the radio.

1111121232223312123132.content:
"Car 412, what's your status, over?" asked Clawhouser.

"We're on Fifth, and Spot, over," said Nick, picking up the CB. "All clear."

"We have a report of a weasel selling what looks like bootlegged copies of some movies over on Sixth and River," said Clawhouser. "Please check it out. Over."

"Will do, over." Nick hung up the CB.

A little while later, Judy and Nick found themselves watching Duke Weaselton trying to sell his DVDs.

"Tell you what, let's make a deal, two movies for five dollars," the weasel said as his latest potential customer walked away. "Your loss."

"More like, they're being smart," said Judy, as she and Nick walked over to the stand that Duke had set up. "Tell me that you were smart enough to get a license to sell these knockoffs?"

"I don't need to tell you anything," said Duke.

"Maybe not, but it looks like you are clearly trying to sell counterfeit movies, which is a violation of your parole," said Nick. "Do you know what that means?"

"Extra jail time," said Judy.

"Bite me," said Duke. "You used to trick people into buying you a Jumbo Pop, which you then melted down into a bunch of pawcicles, and then you'd sell the used sticks to a construction company."

Nick smiled. "Maybe, but I made sure that my paperwork was up to code, so that there was no way I could be legally arrested." He glanced at Judy, before looking back at Duke. "You were smart enough to file your taxes correctly, right?"

"Nice try, I'm not falling for that trick," said Duke. "She may have gotten you on it, but you won't get me."

"Tell me, these movies are in their original cases, right?" Judy asked, picking one up. "I mean, it would be interesting if say, a crowd of unsatisfied customers, upon opening the cases, found that the movies weren't the ones they thought that they had bought, and thus got very upset, especially when, say, a dozen or so also found out that they'd been ripped off, and they all decided to come here and get their money back."

"It's not my fault if they bought the wrong movie," said Duke.

"It is if the movie they find in the case is not the right movie for the case," said Judy. "That's False Advertisement right there. Also, bootlegged copies are a form of Electronic Piracy, which means you're stealing from the people who make the real versions, and they have big expensive lawyers with good track records. So, you tell me; what's going to happen when I open this case?"

Duke gulped at this.
1111121232223312123132.title: Duke Weaselton is up to his old tricks

The pair have a break, in the park.
11111212322233121231321.content:
"Listen, I got something you might want to know," said Duke.

"Like what?" Judy asked.

"Night Howlers. I tell you what I know, and then you leave me be, okay? I'll even pack up shop for the day."

Nick and Judy looked at each other, before looking back at Duke.

"Explain," said Nick.

"There's this rabbit going around asking about them, about who has them, how much they cost, and how many they have," said Duke. "Supposedly, he claims to be a wealthy farmer looking for insect repellent, problem is, he isn't dressed like a farmer."

"What do you mean?" Judy asked.

"Let's just say that I was at one of the places he was asking questions at," said Duke. "Got a good look at him, and what he was wearing, and I might have accidentally lifted his wallet, which had a lot of cash, which got a little lighter, and was replaced where it came from."

"You do realize that you just confessed to theft," said Judy.

"I didn't say that, and you'd better listen," said Duke. "I followed him around, and saw him go to multiple places. He bought a lot of the bulbs, easily two thousand dollars worth. Your average farmer only spends around fifty dollars, unless they get some from a friend who has been growing them for years and is dividing their clumps."

"How do you know this?" Nick asked.

"I did my research when I was working for Doug, although I will be honest, I didn't know what Doug was going to use them for," said Duke. "This guy went to forty stores, and bought fifty dollars worth of bulbs from each of them. Think about it. That's over five thousand bulbs."

"You need a permit if you buy more than a hundred," said Judy. "Father told me that a friend of his had to get a permit in order to get a couple hundred bulbs from the store, to replace some that had washed out when a large section of his fields flooded."

"Can you blame anyone, given what happened?" Nick asked. He looked at Duke. "Got a name for this guy?"

The weasel nodded. "John Lapin. Staying at the King's Hotel. He's rich, and seems polite, but there's that thing that just scares me worse than being given an ice bath by Mr. Big."

"What would that be?" Judy asked.

"His eyes," said Duke. "They seem nice at first glance, but when you get a good look at him, you see the evil hidden behind them. That's the reason I followed him all the way to where he was staying."

Judy an Nick looked at each other.

"Do you think that information is worth it to us leaving him free?" Judy asked.

"He just told us about someone who has bought over two thousand dollars worth of a controlled plant," said Nick. "I don't think it would be worth it to us to arrest him, thanks to this information he so freely gave us. See you later, Duke."

"Yeah," Duke said, as the fox and rabbit started to walk away. "You take care."


Back at their car, the pair looked at each other, and grinned.

"We did say that we won't arrest him," said Judy.

"Nope, and we won't," Nick said as he picked up the CB. "Dispatch."

"Go ahead," said Clawhouser.

"Weasel suspect is Duke Weaselton, and might be in violation of his parole," said Nick. "Suspect was selling movies, possibly counterfeits, and might be moving locations. Backup is requested to arrive silently, and can take credit for the collar if they catch him in the act. That being said, he was nice enough to offer us some information about some illegal Night Howler purchases, so I suggest that the officers take it easy on him."

"Night Howlers?" Clawhouser asked.

"Yeah, buyer is a rabbit named John Lapin, staying at the King's Hotel, and is said to be highly wealthy," said Nick.

"Alright," said Clawhouser. "I'll let Chief Bogo know, and we'll send out a couple of units, one to pick up Duke, and one to check out King's Hotel."

"That's a big 10-4," said Nick as he hung the CB up.

Judy rolled her eyes. "Stick to the correct lingo."

Nick chuckled. "You know you love me."

111112123222331212313212.content:
A little while later, Nick and Judy were on break at the park. Judy was eating a fruit and vegetable salad, while Nick was also eating a Fish and Insect Bar.

"This sure is a nice place," said Judy. "I'm glad you suggested it."

"You're welcome," said Nick. "My mom liked to take me here. It was one of the few places we could go for free."

"You had a rough childhood," said Judy.

"It wasn't easy, I'll tell you that," said Nick. "People didn't trust foxes. It's not really a surprise that I did what I did to put food on the table for me and my mom."

"How many foxes do you know happen to be in that situation?" Judy asked.

"Plenty, and not just foxes," said Nick. "Duke, for instance, would have been an okay person, if he'd been given a chance to do what he really wants to do."

"What would that be?" Judy asked.

"Well, I might be wrong, and he might have been lying to me, but one time we were talking, just conversationally mind you, and he mentioned that he always wanted to be a game show host, or something," said Nick. "Of course, he was looking at a really big and expensive television, so I'm not sure if that was just idle talk, or if I had prevented him from stealing it."

"Right," said Judy. She then looked at Nick. "About last night, um, well, I want to talk about my behavior."

"What about it?" Nick asked. "You gave me permission. You never said 'No', or 'Stop'. Believe me, I wouldn't have done it if you told me to stop."

"To be honest, part of the reason I went through with it was because I didn't want to hurt your feelings, and because I didn't want to worry you," said Judy. "Also, there was that chance, and I wanted you to have a good memory of me."

"Thanks." Nick smiled. "Tell me, would you mind doing it again?"

Judy chuckled. "Well, now that we have the stuff, I wouldn't mind doing it again."

"Got any more of those pills?" Nick asked.

Judy grinned. "I'll have to talk to Chief Bogo about those."

Nick gave her a kiss. "Too bad we're on duty."

Judy smiled. "I know. Perhaps later."

"Yeah, later," said Nick. He took another bite of his meal. "You know, there is a spot that's a little hard to get to, for most cops. Teenagers like to go there, because it's very private."

Judy grinned. "How private?"

"Well, there is cellphone reception, but most people don't bother going there, given what they themselves did there at that age," said Nick.

"So, besides teenagers trying to get lucky, who else uses it?" Judy asked.

"Well, given the location, I have occasionally seen signs of drug use up there," said Nick. "I don't know if any deals are going on, or if they are just using them, but it does sort of ruin the experience when you find someone that got high instead of getting lucky."

"I see," said Judy. She finished her meal. "Perhaps we should check it out."

"Alright," said Nick, finishing the last bite of his bar. "Best let Dispatch know we're checking it out."

Judy grinned. "To be honest, I hope no one is there."

"Agreed," said Nick. "I'd hate for someone to steal our clothes."

Judy chuckled. "Dispatch."

"Go ahead," said Clawhouser.

"Me and Nick are going to check out a spot at the park, which has a history of being a spot for Teens engaging in sexual activity, as well as drug usage," said Judy.

"Alright," said Clawhouser. "The Chief has been wanting to get some people to check that spot out anyways. That being said, if it's just teenagers getting lucky, mind taking it easy on them. Just let them know that we'll be keeping an eye on the spot for a while. Of course, if something else is going on, be sure to contact us before moving in."

"Will do," said Judy. She looked at Nick, and grinned. "Let's go."



A while later, the pair had walked, and climbed, to a location near the spot.

"A bit of a tricky hike," said Judy.

"It's why most cops don't bother coming up here," said Nick. "They don't want to use that shortcut between those crevices in those rocks. By the time they get here the long way, the people have heard them, and left."

"How do you know about it?" Judy asked.

Nick grinned. "Nothing illegal, I assure you."

"Right," said Judy.

"Now, let's be quiet," said Nick. "Got a few more minutes before we get there."
111112123222331212313212.title: The pair have a break, in the park.

"Strange," said Nick. "Usually there's a few people under that tree over there."

"Depends on how old the person was," said Nick. "If they were 18 or older, I'd tell them that I'd think about it. If they were younger, I'd give them a polite no. Last thing I want is a charge of Statutory Rape hanging on my rap sheet. That would have landed me in big trouble, and not just with the police."

Secondary path is that way, and not as well used, but is safe enough to use as an escape route, and has a few spots for lookouts. Then there's the path we came up through, no lookout spots, but most cops are too big to use it, like I told you, although that doesn't mean that smaller teenagers can't use it themselves."

Nick sniffed. "Yeah, I smell something alright."
