1111121232223312123132123233.content:
"You don't want to know," said Chief Bogo.

"What could be so bad that both you and Nick don't want me to see the bodies?" Judy asked.

"Officer Hopps, I'm telling you, you don't want to know-"

Judy dashed off towards where Chief Bogo came from, just as the Cape Buffalo told her to stop. However, Judy ignored this, and even dashed past the two Homicide officers, who tried to stop her, and thus, saw the bodies. The way that they were positioned made her feel sick. One of the officers grabbed her, and dragged her away from the scene, and handed her a bucket. Up came the fruit salad she'd eaten less than an hour earlier.

"We told you that you didn't want to know," said Nick. "Both of us."

Judy wiped her mouth off. "Who could do such a thing? They were dismembered! And not just dismembered, it was as if they were torn to pieces." She sat next to Nick, who held her close.

"As much as I hate to say it, but I hope that they were dead when the perpetrator did that," said Chief Bogo. "That is just a cruel way to kill someone."

"I've never seen anything like that," said Judy.

"Few cops ever do," said Chief Bogo. "I'm sorry you saw them, both of you. It's a side of people I don't ever like to see."

"I kind of wish that I could unsee it," said Nick. "I didn't want her to see it."

"That's why we need good cops like you two," said Chief Bogo. "We catch those who do this sort of thing."

"So, what do we do?" Judy asked.

"It's quite clear you're being targeted," said Chief Bogo. "Therefore......
1111121232223312123132123233.title: We told you that you didn't want to know

choices: I hope that you enjoy the comforts of your room
You might want to get dressed. I have company coming.
11111212322233121231321232332.content:
"I'm assigning you two to work Undercover at Mr. Big's place," said Chief Bogo. "I want to keep an eye on his organization."

"Um, chief, with all due respect, but that would be a waste of mammalpower," said Judy. "Mr. Big knows me and Nick. It doesn't make sense for either of us to even be near him. I mean, I could see you doing it with Officer-"

"It's for your protection," said Chief Bogo. "You are the godmother to his granddaughter, and he owes you for saving his daughter's life, among other things. I dislike and despise the shrew, and if I had the evidence needed, I'd toss him in a teeny, tiny, little cell, and melt down the key, but, for all that, he is honorable, keeps control on most of the criminal organizations, and he would see to it that no harm would come to you or Nick, especially since you are friends with his daughter Fru-Fru."

"He's got a point," said Nick. "The last place anyone would look for us would be at Mr. Big's place, even if they knew that we were there. Anyone other than a polar bear, or an arctic shrew, would stand out at the place."

"Better than trying to explain why you are always at the station, or were reassigned to Bunnyburrows," said Chief Bogo.

"Alright," said Judy. "We'll do it."



A little while later, the two were at Mr. Big's place.

"The idea is kind of foolish, but, at the same time, very smart," said Mr. Big. "Only a complete idiot would attack someone in my place. That, and the fact that you are police officers would prove very useful for me."

"Tell me that you're not going to have us engage in some sort of criminal activity," said Judy.

"That would be a stupid idea, unless you decided to play the part of dirty cops," said Mr. Big. "Like I said, you're too well-known to be undercover, unless you seem to be secretly dirty, which I might buy with Nick, as he's had practice, but with you, forget it, unless you make the nice act seem like it was just an act."

"Actually, she is good with acting," said Nick. "Except when she's pretending to have been killed; then she overacts."

Mr. Big chuckled. "I heard about that. In any case, there will be a business discussion at my place later this week, and having a cop would help some of the others to remember their manners. Personally, I already know who the undercover officers in the other groups are, but I'm smart enough not to reveal who they are."

"Why?" Judy asked.

"Useful if you need an alibi confirmed," said Mr. Big. "Say I was accused of doing something at one place, I could say that I was at another place at the time. The police contact their man on the inside, who was at the place I claimed to be, and there you have it, I wasn't at the scene of the crime."

"Do they know that you know?" Nick asked.

"They suspect it, if nothing else," said Mr. Big. "I won't reveal a cop. That gets you in big trouble. It also gives me power over the other groups, because I make sure that I stay out of any serious legal trouble."

"Well, in any case, thanks for letting us stay with you, until things get resolved," said Judy.

"Oh, and by the way, you know that conversation that we had at the station?" Nick asked.

"What about it?" Mr. Big asked.

Nick pulled out a bottle. "Got a nice little supply. Might come in handy."

Mr. Big chuckled. "I see. Thank you. Do you have more than one bottle?"

"I have a few," said Nick, handing the bottle to Koslov. "Talked to Chief Bogo about it."

"How does it work?" Mr. Big asked.

"I'm not sure about all of the details, but so long as the prey has taken the pill within twelve hours, the predator doesn't feel them escaping from their body," said Nick. "It also keeps the prey clean, and disguises their scent to be that of the predator for a little while."

"Useful to know," said Mr. Big. He looked at them. "You have everything you need?"

"We did need to make a stop for a few things, but we have everything that's important," said Nick.

"Good," said Mr. Big. "I have the perfect covers for you; Miss Hopps, you can be one of my daughter's servants. I know she likes you for what you did."

"Um, thanks," said Judy.

"As for you, Nick," said Mr. Big. "I could always use another bodyguard."

"Sounds like a good cover to me," said Nick.

"Good," said Mr. Big. "That being said,....."
11111212322233121231321232332.title: Hiding in Plain Sight with Mr. Big

choices: "Oh, I have a really great idea."
111112123222331212313212323321.content:
"I hope that you enjoy the comforts of your room," said Mr. Big. "I'm sure that you've had a rough day, and I don't want to immerse you into the criminal world too soon, especially after whatever it was that caused you to get assigned to be undercover at my place. Mind telling me what it was, exactly? I know that someone is targeting you, but I wouldn't mind knowing the details."

Nick looked at Judy, before looking back at Mr. Big. "A fox and a rabbit were dressed up like us, murdered, and then dismembered."

Mr. Big had an impassive look on his face. "Were they a couple?"

"We're not sure," said Judy. "They could have been strangers for all we know, but they looked enough like us that the killer dressed them up as us. It was not pleasant."

"I see," said Mr. Big. "I'll ask around."

"You might want to ask around about Night Howlers, and see who's buying them," said Nick. "We know of a rabbit that's doing that sort of thing."

Mr. Big nodded. "That won't be a problem. For all you know, this could be connected to the plot to free Bellweather."

Nick and Judy looked at each other. "Something to think about."

"Say, anything about those pills I need to know?" Mr. Big asked.

"Yeah," said Nick. "The size between predator and prey can affect just how tired the predator is after the prey gets out. Between me and Judy, I didn't have the energy to do much beyond sitting up. But, between the size of, let's say you and let's say Koslov, there shouldn't be much difference in energy drop."

Mr. Big looked up at his bodyguard. "Useful to know, if I have an unruly guest." He looked back at the pair. "Like I said, enjoy your room, and call if you need anything."



Soon enough, the pair were at their room. The scale of the place had polar bears in mind.

"This is nice," said Judy.

"It's bigger than your apartment room, that's for sure," said Nick.

"Sorry about the size," said Mr. Big. "We don't often get overnight guests that are your size, and I know you're too big for a room my size. Something to think about in the future."

"That it would be," said Nick.

"That being said, you have your own shower and toilet," said Mr. Big. "You have a mini-fridge/freezer, and a few other things."

"There's only one bed though," said Judy.

"You're adults," said Mr. Big. "I'm sure you know enough to share. Then again, it's not like you're actually here to do any work, now are you?"

"Say, do you have any whip cream or blueberries in the fridge?" Nick asked.

"Ah, you want to do page 48?" Mr. Big asked.

"What?" Judy asked.

Mr. Big grinned, and pointed at the magazine the pair had brought with them. "I occasionally skim through the different couples' magazines. Gives me ideas. That one looked like fun, although I might do my own twist on it."

"Such as?" Nick asked.

"Don't tell Fru-Fru, but it would involve me sitting in the middle of the whip cream, surrounded by blueberries, while my lady friend licks them up," said Mr. Big. "That would be my variation. That being said, you'll find some in the fridge."

"Something to think about," said Nick. "Thanks again."

"Later," said Mr. Big, as he and Koslov left the room.

"So, what do you want to do?" Judy asked.

Nick grinned and said...
111112123222331212313212323321.title: I hope that you enjoy the comforts of your room

1111121232223312123132123233211.content:
"Let's get some sleep," said Nick. "It's been a long day, and we could use the rest."

"I guess so," said Judy, as she took her clothes off. "I just hope that we can get some sleep."

Nick smiled as he took his own off. "Same here."



Nick found himself in a forest, running for his life, shadowy figures after him. He tried to avoid them, but they'd grab him. He'd fight them off, and kept running. "Judy!" He kept running. "Where are you?"

"Nick?"

He stopped at the sight that greeted him. "Judy?" He gasped at what he saw. It was Judy's head, stuck on a tree limb.

"Nick! Look out!"

He turned, and was confronted by the sight of Bellweather.

"Fear always works," the sheep said, as she aimed her weapon at him. "Bye-bye, fox." She pulled the trigger.

Nick tried to move when he felt a jolt of pain that forced his eyes to open, alongside of an ear-splitting scream.



Nick blinked, as he looked up at a polar bear. "Kevin? Mind letting go of my ear?"

Kevin let go.

Nick looked over at Judy, and saw that she too was rubbing one of her ears.

"What happened?" she asked.

"Sounded to me like you were having some sort of shared nightmare sort of thing."

Nick looked, and saw that Mr. Big was there with Koslov. He looked over at Judy, and saw that she was looking at him. "Did you have one too?"

She grabbed a hold of him. "Oh Nick." She started to cry in his chest. Nick held onto her.

"That's our cue to leave," said Mr. Big. "Kevin."

Kevin left the room, and the door closed.

"Are you alright?" Nick asked.

"It was horrible," said Judy. "I was being chased. I saw your body, and then it just got worse."

"It was just a dream," said Nick, as he kept a hold of Judy. "That's all that matters. You're here, I'm here, and Bellweather is in prison where she belongs."

Judy looked at him. "She was in your dream too?"

Nick closed his eyes, and nodded.

"Do you think she's behind the murder of those two innocent mammals?" Judy asked.

"If she is, she'll pay for it, as will those who follow her," said Nick. "And if it wasn't her, we'll get whomever it was. We have connections to both side of the law here. Chief Bogo will have the ZPD out searching the streets, looking in the ways that are legal, while Mr. Big has his goons search the back-alleys and the like in ways that the police can't. This sicko will be found, you understand?"

"I don't know," said Judy. "I'm a little out of my league here."

"Tell me, how many people told you that you'd never become a cop?" Nick asked.

"A lot of people," said Judy.

"And regardless of all that, you became a cop," said Nick. "And while we might have gotten off on the wrong foot, you're the one who convinced me to become a cop as well. Here I am, Officer Nicholas Piberius Wilde, and I'm partnered to a very smart cop, who is braver than even she cares to admit, who is loyal, truthful, and was the first person to see me as anything other than a fox."

Judy looked up at him. "Do you think that we can catch this guy?"

"Officer Hopps, you solved the biggest missing mammal case in under 48 hours," said Nick. "Then, you found out what was making people go savage, and then you tricked Bellweather into confessing her plan, just as the whole of the ZPD showed up."

"Well, you had to admit that luck was involved, and that we had some help," said Judy. "Then there was that disaster of a news conference."

"Who doesn't need help at times?" Nick asked. "Who doesn't make mistakes? And sometimes, you need a little bit of luck."

"Still, how are we to get any decent sleep, after what we saw today?" Judy asked. "All I can think about is-"

Nick placed a finger over her mouth. "Then, we're just going to have to think about something else, and an idea just came to mind. It might not work, but it might help." He removed his finger, and kissed her on the lips.

"I suppose that might work," said Judy. "We have the stuff with us."

"Now, for the big question," said Nick. "Do you want me to do you from the front, the back, or something more exotic?"

Judy smiled, and said...
1111121232223312123132123233211.title: "Let's get some sleep."

choices: "In that case, enjoy yourself, but I get her next."
"How about I get to enjoy her first?"
"I can think of a few others who'd be interested in dealing with her."
11111212322233121231321232332111.content:
"The regular method will be fine," said Judy. "After all, you're just trying to relax me."

Nick grinned. "To be honest, anything would be better than that nightmare; even one where you're angry at me for leaving the toilet seat up, or something like that, and you turn into a giant that threatens to step on me."

Judy smiled. "Yes, even a regular nightmare would have been preferable." She blinked. "Um, have you honestly had one like that?"

"It was off the top of my head," Nick said as he reached for their things, at which point, he stopped, and grabbed something else. "You know what, I just had a crazy idea." He showed Judy the bottle of pills. "How would you like to give our nightmare some nightmares of their own?"

Judy looked at the bottle, and then she looked at Nick. "Use a pill on Bellweather?"

"Exactly," said Nick. "She thought that I was going to eat you. It would only be fair to return the favor."

"There's a lot of problems with that scenario," said Judy. "The least of which is that it might be illegal. Someone might consider it to be Cruel and Unusual Punishment."

"You saw what those Night Howler pellets did to people, and what happened as a result," said Nick. "It would be ironic."

"Just to be clear, you're talking about giving her the pill first, right?" Judy asked.

"Of course," said Nick. "I want her to be afraid of us, not dead."

"Still, to pull this off, we would need some help," said Judy.

Nick grinned. "And I have just the people in mind."



"And this pill protects the user from being digested?" the owner of the pharmacy on Stripe and 7th said as he looked at the pills. "Amazing. I can think of a few scenarios where this pill might enhance things."

"Why are we here?" Lionheart asked, as he looked at the others seated at the table. "Why can't this be discussed over the phone?"

"Phones can be bugged," said Mr. Big. "That and we don't want any record of this meeting to be found, save that of memory, which can be persuaded to lie if need be."

"I don't like it myself, but given what's been going on, I understand the need for this sort of thing," said Chief Bogo.

"So, what's going on here?" Lionheart asked.

"Bellweather is planning to escape under the cover of a rather large riot, which is partially induced by Night Howler pellets being fired at the crowd over at the courthouse over whether or not you should still be the mayor of Zootopia, due to your part in having the missing mammals captive," said Chief Bogo.

"I thought that was over," said Lionheart. "A hundred hours of community service, per person I held, plus two years supervised probation, and in return, I remain mayor."

"Yes, but some might find fault with letting a known kidnapper remain mayor," said Mr. Big. "Especially a predator."

"I thought that was over and done with," said Lionheart. "I did what I did for the city."

"Maybe you did, and maybe you didn't," said Mr. Big. "But the riot is a decoy, which would occupy a number of available officers, which would allow Bellweather's group to rescue her from prison. But that is nothing compared to the cherry on top of the sundae. During the confusion, Officers Hopps and Wilde would be separated from any and all backup, at which point, they'd be grabbed. Afterwards, they would be brutally murdered, with their bodies being torn apart by a really psychotic sicko, whom even the likes of those such as myself tend to avoid."

"But, how do you know all this?" Lionheart asked.

"Helps to have eyes and ears in the various gangs, and it helps to know people who can do what we can't," said Chief Bogo.

"He took the high road, and I took the low road, and then we shared each other's maps to find any overlap," said Mr. Big. "That and knowing a few people who know other people never hurts. Koslov."

The polar bear took out a smartphone, and placed it on the table. He tapped a few apps, and got to the necessary information, before handing it to the lion.

Lionheart took a look, and gasped in surprise. "She's done all this while locked in a cell?"

"And to think that you never gave her a real chance to shine honestly," said Mr. Big. "In a way, this comes back to whatever happened between the two of you."

Lionheart frowned. "I suppose I was a little rough on her."

"You backed her into a corner, and she found a way to fight back," said Nick. "Everyone fights in a corner."

"To be fair, you did just stick her in a broom closet and called it an office," said Judy. "After that, and everything else you put her through, she got motivated to bring you down the hard way."

"And then she got motivated again, and figured out how to communicate with the outside," said Chief Bogo. "Can't be through the guards; I can vouch for most of them, and those I can't personally vouch for are vouched for by those I trust."

"It isn't any of the convicts," said Mr. Big. "Even those guys wouldn't stand for what she did."

"How about a drone?" the store owner suggested, as he came up from looking at the pills. "I've sold more than a few of them, and there's ways you can attach cameras to them. Some are small enough to be missed, if the flyer is skillful enough. Hide it where the guards can't spot it, and you have a way to send messages."

"That's just plain crazy," said Lionheart. "Who would even work for her after what she did?"

"Talking to you is your chief of police, and right next to him, also talking to you, is the city's highest ranked crime boss," said the store owner. "That is crazy right there. Besides, there's lots of crazy people out there, and not just the ones who buy my magazines. There's the crazier ones who burn them. I have pictures of those guys."

"Doesn't make them the people we are after," said Chief Bogo. He looked at the mayor. "That being said, she has managed to rally a number of speciest groups together, mostly Prey types, but there are a few Predators in the mix, all dangerous ones."

"I avoid them myself," said Mr. Big. "Too much hate is bad for business."

"So, what's the plan?" Lionheart asked.

"Already in progress," said Chief Bogo. "It seems there was a bit of an increase in gang violence over the last few hours, which resulted in a lot of Probable Cause Searches and Seizes , who shut down a large number of labs that were making Night Howler pellets, and the arrest of over two hundred dangerous speciest group members, as of the present moment."

"Warrant-less searches?" Lionheart asked.

Chief Bogo grinned. "Don't need one when you have probable cause, and spotting suspicious characters breaking into places and fighting with the people inside is probable cause on the books."

"Still going to be a nightmare," said Lionheart. "And Bellweather?"

"Can't be the leader of a group if you don't have a group to rally behind you," said Chief Bogo. "It's more embarrassing when you don't know they've been arrested."

"So, what are you going to do about her?" Lionheart asked.

Chief Bogo passed the pill bottle over to Lionheart.

Lionheart looked at the pill bottle, and grinned. "Not what I had in mind when I had them made, but I must admit, a part of me always did wonder how she tasted, if you know what I'm talking about."

"Page 34 of Lion and Sheep," said the store owner, putting down a magazine. "It has mint jelly in it."

Lionheart looked at the cover of the magazine. "Um, I don't read these things."

"Yeah you do," said the store owner. "I never forget a customer, or a purchase, and you've bought no less than a dozen of these magazines, through an intermediary of course, but I know that they shopped for you."

"Of course, if you don't want it, I might want to take a look at it for ideas on what I'm going to do to Bellweather," said Nick.

"You think that you're going to be the first to taste that, that, that ewe?" Lionheart asked.

"Yeah, and Judy's going to help," said Nick.

Lionheart looked at her. He picked up the magazine, opened it to the page, and looked at it. "Interesting." He then looked at the pair.
11111212322233121231321232332111.title: The Plot that was Foiled Before it Started

111112123222331212313212323321111.content:
"In that case, enjoy yourselves, and let me know when it is done," said Lionheart. "I might want a taste of her afterwards."

"Understood," said Chief Bogo. "Take care."

Lionheart stood up, took out a five, and placed it on the table. "For the magazine."

"Come back any time," said the store owner as the lion left the place.

"Okay, someone fill us in on what happened while Nick and me were at Mr. Big's?" Judy asked. "I mean, we barely know the basics."

"That would be some good information to know," said Nick.

"I'll fill you in on my end," said Chief Bogo.




(Earlier that day.)

"Listen up people," said Chief Bogo as he addressed the assembled officers. "We are dealing with a case that hits close to home, and it is Top Priority!"

A projector turned on, showing pictures of the fox and rabbit who had been murdered, along with the clothes they'd been wearing.

"The bad news is that these two were murdered. The worst news is this, these were just some random people this sicko picked up to use as practice for the real thing, and anyone with even half a brain can figure out who is being targeted! I don't need to state that I want this person found! However, this is only the beginning."

The projector changed its images. It was the rabbit that Duke Weaselton had spotted, and tailed.

"Acting upon information passed onto us by an informant, some of our officers went to question this rabbit, John Lapin, over some of his recent purchases in regards to the controlled plant known as Midnicampum holicithias, or, in laymammal terms, Night Howlers. He was found in possession of several thousand bulbs, without a proper permit. When questioned, he became violent, and attacked the officers, who were thankfully able to subdue him."

"Do we know if there is a connection between the Night Howlers and the double homicide?" a lion officer asked.

"Unknown," said Chief Bogo. "However, the possibility is there. Then, there's a third priority; Rumors of a possible escape attempt at the Maximum Security Prison, involving one former-Mayor Bellwether. Thanks to some information from a reliable source, there are a number of people planning to break her out. We have pictures and video that has been offered to us by a number of store owners who have noticed these people. They are to be checked out."

"Is there-"

"Unknown," said Chief Bogo. We could be dealing with three separate crimes, or they could be connected, or maybe every wacko planned to do something this week on their own time, and we're stuck dealing with the mess; find them, and put a stop to them. Bend a few rules if you have to, and maybe a few papers might get misplaced, but I want these cases solved quickly. I doubt that this even close to being the least of our worries. Now, here's your assignments..."



Nick and Judy looked at each other as Chief Bogo finished telling them what had happened on his end.

"You did all that?" Judy asked.

Chief Bogo looked at them, and nodded. "We look after our own."

"And likewise, I look after my family," said Mr. Big.



(Also, a few hours earlier.)

Mr. Big sat on a desk, staring at the heads of the various crime families. Most were bigger that him, stronger too, and plenty could eat him in a single bite, and there was a few who he knew were making moves to remove him, but he hadn't gotten in charge of them by being nice himself.

"You have two cops staying here," stated Mr. Lobo. "Why?"

"Why do you want to know?" Mr. Big asked, civilly. "What business is it of yours if I do have a couple of cops staying here, especially since the one is the godmother to my grandchild, and the other is like a son to me, a disrespectful son who went off on his own, but a son nonetheless, and both have done a lot of good for this city?"

"Some are saying that you're going soft," said Mr. Lobo. "They say you're cooperating with the police. They say that you are planning to rat out all of us, so that you can take control of everything! Here's what me and my pack have to-"

Suddenly, the wolf found himself grabbed out of his chair by a pair of polar bears, and a paw clamped down on his muzzle. The other wolves were about to make their move to protect their leader, when Mr. Big called out.

"Hold it."

The wolves looked at him. There was a look in his eyes that commanded every thought in their bodies.

"Sit."

The wolves sat.

"Good boys, and unless you want your boss to end up dead, you'll stay sitting." He looked at his polar bears. "Bring him."

The polar bears brought the struggling wolf forward.

"So, you thought that you could make your move here in my place, I have to give you credit for that." The shrew chuckled. "Now, you're wondering why I don't chuck you into the Deep Freeze right this moment, but that's because I'm feeling generous, and I'm going to let you live to tell everyone just how generous I am. Koslov."

Koslov placed a pill bottle on the desk.

"The police are planning to hire rodent officers, to help them patrol areas their larger officers can get into, such as cracks in peoples' homes," said Mr. Big. "The problem is, what if they encountered a rude lout like our friend here, who decides to eat them to silence them." Mr. Big grinned. "The solution is simple, enter the throat, pass through the digestive system, and come out the anus, as Mr. Lobo here will so kindly demonstrate, with the help of my guard Raymond, with the help of these pills, which those two officers gave to me. Let him speak."

The polar bear holding Mr. Lobo's mouth shut let go.

Mr. Lobo growled. "You plan to kill me by having me become polar bear shit!"

"You were planning to kill me just now," said Mr. Big. "I'm giving you a chance to live, which is more than what you were about to give me. Of course, there's always the alternative."

At this, a guard removed some floorboards, revealing the ice pool under them.

"How long do you think you will last in there?" Mr Big asked. "Thirty minutes, at most." He gestured over to the pills. "According to my information, that pill will protect you from being digested for twelve hours, and aside from smelling like polar bear, you'd be safe. Of course, there's the chance it might not work, and you'd be dead anyways." Mr. Big looked at Mr. Lobo. "The ice, or, as you put it, polar bear shit?"

Mr. Lobo looked at the ice pool. Then he looked at the pill bottle. He looked at Mr. Big. "I'll take my chances."

Mr. Big grinned. "Good."

Koslov opened the bottle, and shook out a pill. He then walked over to Mr. Lobo, and shoved the pill down the wolf's throat. Then, he got out a muzzle and rope, and started to apply them to the wolf.

"I've heard of those who entertained thoughts of being prey, and those who entertain thoughts of being a predator," said Mr. Big as his guards finished binding their victim. "Me, I think I'll just watch."

That was when Raymond started to devour Mr. Lobo headfirst. The wolf tried to struggle at first, but the polar bear was stronger than him, and was assisted by several others.

The other crime bosses watched in horrid fascination at the punishment that was occurring in front of them, as soon the bear's mouth slipped past the wolf's shoulders. Within the space of a minute, all that was left was a bulge in the polar bear's guts.

"He'll be out in a few hours, and in need of fresh clothes," said Mr. Big. "Now, who else wishes to challenge me?"

The other crime bosses looked at the pills, and looked at the number of polar bears Mr. Big had; there was at least one for each other them, and plenty more to spare. They stayed put.

Mr. Big grinned. "I thought you'd see it my way. Now, let's get down to business."




Once again, Nick and Judy looked at each other. "What happened to Mr. Lobo?"

"When he came out of Raymond, he encountered Kevin, who made sure he took a shower, before making his apology to me," said Mr. Big. "Seems he was feeling grateful for being allowed to live. Of course, there was other business to be done, much of which Chief Bogo talked about. After that, we swapped information, compared notes, made plans, got to work."

Nick and Judy looked at each other. "Good to know."

Mr. Big grinned. "Give Bellwether my regards when you see her. Tell her I'll be waiting for her if she escapes."

"We'll keep that in mind," said Nick.

"I'm sure you want to go home now," said Chief Bogo. "I have a lot of work to do, and you need your sleep."

"That we do," said Judy.
111112123222331212313212323321111.title: What Happened Before the Meeting

choices: We try page 48 with the blueberries and Whipped Cream.
Actually, let's just go to bed.
1111121232223312123132123233211111.content:
"It feels good to be home," said Judy, as she entered her apartment room. "I mean, Mr. Big's place is nice, but there's something about being home."

"I know what you mean," Nick said, as he put away some groceries they'd gotten. "I just wish that I lived someplace other than the park."

"You know, you could live with me," said Judy. "I'm sure that Dharma would allow it, providing that you helped to pay the rent of course."

"Are you sure about that?" Nick asked. "You'd actually let me live with you?"

"We are both adults here," said Judy. "Besides, it wouldn't be good for the Police Department's reputation if one of their officers was without a place to live."

Nick smiled. "That would be very nice." He walked over to her and gave her a kiss.

"Welcome home," said Judy. "And, to celebrate, how about...."
1111121232223312123132123233211111.title: At Judy's Apartment

11111212322233121233.content:
Nick woke up and realized that he felt lighter than he remembered being the day before...

The fox raised his head and directed all his attention to his belly... "Judy!", he shouted. But it was too late... A small layer of fat covered what had previously been his thin abdomen.

11113311111121.content:
You couldn't exactly fit in your police vehicle--and you doubted it could haul your massive weight anyway--so you and Judy decided to walk your beat today, down to a warehouse in the Rainforest District.

Judy cautiously inquired as to how you felt after a long walk, clearly worried about your feet and legs but also... you could seem to see a glimmer of admiration in her eyes, in the way her breath shallowed when she looked at your massive stomach.

"Nah, Carrots," you shrug, "I feel great actually." To your surprise as you consider it, you do. It's as if you're gaining enough muscle, something powerful is making mobility easier. You don't exactly feel like you could sprint like a cheetah but you feel like you could work up slowly into a run and manage the huge momentum at least as long as you could as a fox.

If you didn't get stuck in between buildings.

Arriving at the warehouse, dripping with overgrowth of wild greenery everywhere, you find an unlocked side door... and unfortunately, your new girth prevents you from entering it.

After an embarrassing, blush faced moment of polite explaining and understanding between you and Judy you agree to split up, where she would enter the warehouse this way and you would try and find a more suitable entrance around back.

Sure enough, there was a loading bay slightly opened, meant for things as large as delivery trucks and similarly-sized foxes.

You manage to lift the bay door, which moved silently. Everything in a rain forest must be kept perpetually oiled.

Inside, you see a shocking sight: A group of mammals were loading contraband, what looked like small bags of an unidentified powder, into dolls meant to be shipped around the world. They varied in size, It looked like a few larger mammals meant for muscle, a buffalo even bigger than Bogo and a hippo were overseeing mid-sized wolves and felines who were assembly-lining the process. The ground had a rhythmic seismic pound to it, and you could see walking in an elephant in a fine suit and sunglasses, with gold growns on each tusk.

He didn't need to introduce himself as the operator, the top of the operation. the way he oversaw it like he was watching puppets dance to his music said everything.

They may have been so much larger than you, but you knew with that powerful stomach they'd all be inside your own personal jail before long. The only question was, where was Judy?

"Who do you think owns this place?"

"I do need a lot more space, Carrots, I am a growing fox after all." You idly slosh your belly, an effect like wave pool over your massive furry frame.

As she did, her stomach acids stated to do it's job. The wolf could only scream in pain. As hours past, the screaming stopped and the wolf was reduced to being fat in Judy's belly. Her belly was still larger than herself, but smoother now. As Judy got up, she really felt her belly was heavy.

"So full. I can't believe that I actually did that." Judy thought in disbelief. She just ate someone... and somewhat liked it. A prey mammal eating a predator? Has that even happened before. "Ugh! I put on quite a bit of weight from him." Judy patted her stomach. It felt pretty sloshy. "I need to take a break after that. I also better not tell the chief."

After that, Judy's clocked out. Her shift was over anyway. She headed home and rested for the night. The next day....
1221211.title: Judy doesn't let the wolf out and digests him.

12212112.content:
Judy woke up to get ready for another day of work. She was still feeling bloated from her "capture" the other day. But now it took a much bigger tow on her body. Now it wasn't just her stomach, it was her whole body. She couldn't even be called a bunny. Just a fat one. Her face cheeks puffed out like she was holding tennis balls in them. Her belly shrunk a bit compared to yesterday. But what seem to grow the most was her butt and thighs. They were immensely bigger than average and Judy noticed.

Judy looked at herself in the mirror and looked a bit.... stunned by the extra weight she had put on. She turned around and noticed her wide and plump thighs.

"*sigh* Looks like that criminal made his way right here." Judy said patting her hips. "The officers in the precincts are gonna start calling me Judy 'Hipps'."

Future nickname or not, Judy still had to go into work. She changed into her uniform (which still fitted her) and made her way into work.

Today, Judy just did....
12212112.title: Judy "Hipps"

122121121.content:
Once again, Judy was patrolling the city. She was going solo again as she drove her squad car.

After the last guy, Judy was trying to resist the urge to eat anyone else. Judy didn't want to make a habit out of it. You know, eating people. Even if they were criminals.

"Just do your job, Hopps."Judy said to herself. "Look around the streets, watch out for criminals, capture criminals, and NOT eat them."

Judy was stricted and tried to do her job the right way. She really was trying not to eat anyone else. She was a bunny after all. Bunnies are still basically pred, not predators. Even if a small part of Judy found the wolf quite.... tasty.

After a hour of driving around town, Judy started noticing some criminal activity. From a distance, she spots....
122121121.title: Criminal watching on the streets.

122121122.content: Before we continue, does Judy tell Nick what she did? Or does she keep it a secret?
122121122.title: Patroling with Nick.

choices: “Let’s look out for criminals.” ‘I want another one for lunch!’
“Let’s get some lunch together...” ‘...why does Nick smell... tasty?’
1221211222.content:
Judy decided to keep her new ability a secret to her partner as she got into their police cruiser.

“Well, well, well~ Eat too many carrots, Carrots~?” The fox teased as the bunny simply blushing, huffing as she suddenly forwarded the vehicle, Nick’s face nearly planting itself on the glove box.

“Hmph. You should know better than to comment on a lady’s weight, Wilde~” She teased back as he felt his face up for injuries. Fortunately, he was wearing his seat belt, leaving him with nothing more than an increased heart rate.

“Point taken then. What’s the plan today then, Judy?” He asked.

From now on, the choices will consist of what Judy will keep secret and what she’ll say instead of her thoughts. Example below.
1221211222.title: Don’t tell Nick.

choices: "I'll walk. Nick can take the police cruiser."
"I'll take the cruiser. Nick can walk."
12212112221.content:
As much as she considered controlling her urge, Judy was really considering eating another criminal. It also didn't help that she was very hungry. So, went with her stomach and decided to have a criminal for lunch.

She just had to make sure if they caught a criminal that Nick didn't know. First, she had to get her partner to leave. Judy then parked the car.

"I suggest that we split up to cover more ground." The bunny suggested.

"You sure you can handle things on your own without me?" The fox asking looking concern.

"I handled patrolling on my own more than once. Including yesterday. I will be fine." Judy said confidently.

"Alright." Nick said. "Want me to walk or are you gonna be the walker? Trying to reframe from making another fat joke."
12212112221.title: “Let’s look out for criminals.”

choices: Three more wolves- passing around a suspicious plastic baggie (drug trade)
An awfully big, broad, burly looking tiger prying a chain off a door (break-in)
122121122212.content:
Judy snorted at Nick's teasing- she was telling him off playfully. But really, she thought it was good to have a sense of humor about herself. Especially since she couldn't exactly deny being more than a bit reubenesque.

"I'll take the cruiser. You can walk- after all, it's not like I need the exercise." She cooed. Nick chuckled, as he stepped out, raising a hand casually in a sort of wave.

"Alright then- suit yourself! Though if you wanna talk about exercise, a walk for you right now would probably also count as weight lifting." Nick said with a smug smirk, laughing as Judy playfully swatted at him.

"I'm gonna check out the next few blocks to the east side- you circle around West for a while. Sound good?" Nick asked.

Judy smiled up at him, nodding in confirmation. "Works for me. Meet you back here in an hour or so!" Judy said cheerfully, the portly rabbit comfortably situated in the seat of the cruiser- not having to overextend her heavy, fatty body. A body she was hoping to add a little more mass to....


As she drove on, Judy spotted something suspicious down an alleyway, just out of the driver's side window...
122121122212.title: I'll take the cruiser. Nick can walk

choices: Judy meets back up with Nick- and something... interesting happens?
On her way back, Judy spots another criminal she'd like to "arrest"
1221211222121.content:
Judy scanned the trio- wolves, two grey and one brown. They looked to be in the middle of a small scale drug deal. And they were each about as big as that first wolf she ate yesterday...maybe even a bit bigger. Judy smirked, and licked her lips eagerly.

She twisted the wheel, pulling the police cruiser into the alley and cornering the crooks- who all jumped up in surprise and alarm, now that a cop car had cut off their only exit. Judy leaned out of the window, calling out to the three of them.

"Well look at this." She said, a little smug contempt in her tone. "I hope for your own sake that you guys are just lending each other some sugar."

"Hey...wait a sec- You're that one bunny cop, who figured out the mayor was crooked." One of the gray wolves said, sneering a little as he tried to hide the plastic baggie he held.

"Looks like she let herself go a bit..." The other grey wolf muttered, his companion swiftly elbowing him in the ribs "shut it moron! Don't make this worse for us!"

The brown wolf snarled- "Worse? We're busted! Run, idiots!" He said, beginning to bolt around the police car- before its opening door slammed him in the face. Judy stepped out- the other two gray wolves trying to take advantage of her being distracted, but a few well aimed tranquilizers from her little dart gun managed to knock them down.

"Aw- I was kinda hoping all three of you'd be awake for this." She said, smiling down at the dazed brown wolf.

"Wh...awake for wh-" he got cut off, as Judy gripped his ears, tugging him forwards- and shoving his entire snout into her own maw, effectively muzzling him. His eyes widened in confusion, as his panicked yells were quickly muffled as the fatass rabbit slurped him down. From his face, to neck, using both hands to help force in the shoulders- leaning back her head as she gulped down to his waist, and letting gravity cause him to slide down her throat- his large bare paws the last thing sticking out of her mouth, still kicking and wiggling in panic, before Judy's tongue lapped at his toes- helping to pull them in- along with her forceful swallows- until the entire wolf ended up packed into her bulging belly, which surged forth in front of her even more now.

With a satisfied huff, Judy gripped her belly with both arms, waddling around to the other side of the patrol car to the two tranquizlied gray wolves, laying on top of each other. Judy giggled, dropping her heavy, sloshy, wriggling belly as she prepared to repeat her feast. "It's awfully nice that there are two of you..." She muttered, chuckling to herself. "One for each buttcheek after you're digested!" She said, bending over and grabbing one pair of feet, bringing them to her eagerly awaiting mouth and sliding them in, toes first.

As Judy gulped and slurped down the two unconscious lupines, she found that they went down a lot faster than the others- probably because they weren't struggling. All the wriggling was fun, of course, feeling her pray squirm its way down inside her- but there was also something gratifying about smoothly, quickly gulping down a whole wolf in one clean motion, her belly filling up so fast that it blimped up in size all at once- the front of her suit actually finally ripping after swallowing the first grey wolf, exposing her own fuzzy gray belly. Not that that stopped her from slurping down the second grey wolf, just as fast. Now she was truly bloated- her fat, squishy body merely a base for the huge expanse of her belly, packed with three whole wolves, bursting out from the torn seams of her outfit, so big it touched the ground when she stood up.

Judy let out a resounding, proud, brassy belch- giggling as she rubbed her titanic tummy. "I'd say that's a good day's work! Breakfast, lunch, and dinner- all at once!" She beamed, before hoisting herself up into the squad car- having to tuck her enormous belly under the dashboard, pressing against her legs.

Judy glanced at the clock. "oh- Shoot! It's almost been an hour already? I'd better go back and meet up with Nick. Wonder what he'll think of all this~" she giggled, pulling out of the alleyway.
1221211222121.title: Three more wolves

choices: "Judy- what happened???" Judy has the option to lie or come clean.
"...Ohhh I get it- you've been eating criminals." Nick figured it out on his own
12212112221212.content:
As the tremendously bloated Officer Hopps drove back, frequently letting out gentle burps as her prey wriggled and kicked in her engorged, exposed, suit-tearingly big belly, she wore a satisfied smile- enjoying the stuffed, full feeling.

It really was an awful lot of food- especially for a bunny. She was happy with her meal, and really did have no plan to eat anything- or rather, anyone- else.

...until she happened to spot the tiger.

She slowed the car- stopping to stare for a moment.

Around the back of a nice, fairly upscale jewelry store, there was a little vent- which someone could enter without tripping a security alarm. Apparently, a crafty tiger figured this out- and he was willing to get down on his elbows and knees, and army crawl through the vent- grab all the jewelry he could hold- and slip back out.

Judy couldn't believe it. A tiger- big, tall, muscular- meaty. So much mass on the average tiger- it was like two whole more wolves. And here one was! On the ground, back turned to her, colorful stripes tail wiggling around in the air as he took a long time to squeeze through a narrow vent. Judy's belly gurgled...she was already so full but...darn it- her mouth was watering, he was just there- waiting to be grabbed. It was irresistible!

Cautiously parking the car, the fattened, massively overfed rabbit with a belly full of wolves carefully lowered herself out of the car- holding her belly and approaching slowly- anticipation building as drool ran down her chin- as she eyes up that long, lashing tail- those big bare feet, toned calves and beefy thighs, and that bulging, protruding butt- wiggling temptingly side to side as the tiger crawled.

Judy got down right behind the tiger- laying on her belly at first, but rolling herself forwards- so her face was close to the ground- to the tiger's big paws- and her torso was at an angle, her feet up in the air above her own head and her belly sticking out behind her. She was so close, she could smell the tiger's musk.

And then, she went for it! Catching the tiger by the toe- as it were- but certainly not letting him go when he started to hollar. She ran her tongue along his sole, getting a taste- before opening wide and slipping the toes between her lips- gripping the other paw and forcing it in similarly.

She began to pull him in- feeling up his thick, heavy, beefy figure as she gripped him, using her paws to help push him in, as she savored the taste and feel of his meaty legs on her tongue and in her throat- even pausing for a moment once his pelvis crossed her lips, really taking a moment to savor the curvature of his sculpted pumped up glutes in her mouth, even running her tongue along the considerable bulge in his crotch as she continued to eat him up.

She felt her mouth strain as his body sloped outwards, she really had to work to gulp down those dramatically oversized pumped up juicy pecs, and those broad, squared off, powerful shoulders. The brutish thief wasn't going down so easy- and Judy was learning that she loved her meals with a little spice~

The last thing to go down was his bellowing head- Judy felt her mouth close around his eyes, his muzzle sticking out- unable to open with hers wrapped around it. And with one final gulp, he was down.

And Judy...was huge.

She ecstatically giggled- periodically letting out little burps like hiccups, as her latest pray continued to vigorously struggle and fight- her belly so much bigger than before, the ribs in her suit having been torn future into a big huge hole for her glorious fuzzy belly to balloon out from, so full that her fur was thinned at points, unable to cover all that space. Her strained skin visible as a ligh red, with a few stretch marks around the sides.

Judy clumsily rolled over- sitting down on her fat butt with her legs out in front of her, as she lovingly massaged and kneaded her own sprawling wildly overfilled belly with both her fingers and her toes, as it was so big it stuck out further than her legs were long.

Eventually, once her tumultuous tummy had settled down just a bit- still nowhere near digested (though she was looking puffier already)- Just enough stillness for her to comfortably waddle around clutching it, she made her way back to the car.

Even after adjusting the seat so it went back as far as it could, Judy could barely squeeze into the car- it was an even tighter fit than before. She giggled, burping happily again as she said "rrmmm....breakfast, lunch, dinner.....and one hell of a good dessert... I should eat this well more often!"

And with that, she began to drive back- doing her best to press the tips of her plump toes to the pedals, reaching around that glorious gut.



When Judy eventually did get back to the street where she and Nick had split up, she pulled over to his side, cranking down the window. "H-urrp-hey, Nick~"

Nick's eyes widened for a moment, as he took in the dramatic growth of his partner. After a moment, he raised an eyebrow and said...
12212112221212.title: Judy spots another meal- er- another Criminal

choices: "I'm completely okay with this. Heck, I think it's impressive!"
"Sorry, but I really doubt I should let this one slide."
122121122212122.content:
"....Ohhh- I get it." Nick said, a smug, self satisfied tone to his voice. Judy raised an eyebrow at him, before Nick said "you've been eating criminals! I was wondering what you did to make you grow so much so fast, but this does explain it."

Judy's eyes widened in mild surprise for a moment- before she quickly scoffed, trying to play it off. "Psht, what- you think- What? Niiick that's ridiculous- I just ate...lots of food. Took a real long lunch break. Honestly, do you-"

"Carrots." Nick said, cutting her off.

"Hm?" She responded, curiously tilting her head. Before Nick reached trough the window- grabbing a particular odd shape pressing against the inside of her huge belly.

"This is a foot." He stated, matter-of-factly. Judy blinked at the impression- it undeniably was, a stray limb from one of her meals.

"Ahahaa....welll...." Judy giggled, pushing the lump in her belly back down into place. "Maybe just...one or two....or three...maybe four wolves....and a tiger."

"Well heck when you say it like that it sounds like so little." Nick said, sarcastically. Judy groaned, realizing her little secret was busted.

"Rnnghh. Fine- I'll stop, just please don't tell the chief and everyone, I'll take some time off and get back-" Nick cut her off again,

"Woah, woah, woah- hold on, Carrots..."
122121122212122.title: "...Ohhh I get it- you're eating criminals"

choices: she's massively obese! But she can still waddle to work to meet Nick!
She got nice and fat alright...Too fat to move. WAY too fat! Like, By a LOT.
1221211222121221.content:
"I am, believe it or not, absolutely okay with this." Nick said with a straight face.

Judy blinked. "...for real?" She asked, a bit taken aback.

"You know it." Nick answered, with a wry smile, pulling open the car door. "Now, get the heck out of the driver's seat. I'll take you home and then drop the car off at the station."

With a grunt of effort, Judy stumbled out from the car- her belly so big that even with both arms hugging it for support, it was touching the ground as she waddled around the car, sticking out as many feet in front of her as it was wide. She squeezed into the passengers side, moving her chair back as Nick moved his seat forwards again to drive.

"So, wait. You're just totally okay with me eating people?" Judy asked incredulously.

"Not just okay- I'm on board with it." Nick confirmed.

"So...if I wanna keep on eating criminals..." Judy started, trailing off expectantly.

"I'll help you." Nick stated, chuckling as he added "I get the feeling you'll have trouble chasing them down."

Judy snorted, before thinking for another moment. "Well that's great- it is, but...why?"

"Well, first of all- you're an INCREDIBLY close personal friend of mine, but almost as importantly-" he said, before giving Judy a big, gleaming grin. "It's impressive. REAL impressive- I'm interested in seeing how this'll all play out. How far we can take it."

Judy stared for a moment, before a grin crept across her face too, and she laughed. "You're still as shady as the day I met you, Nicholas Wilde. You know that?"

Nick laughed, "It's cool in the shade!"



And so, Nick brought Judy home- even helping her in. The behemoth bunny flopping onto her bed, which creaked and groaned under her massive weight. She proudly gazed upon her gargantuan belly, rising high above her. She drifted to sleep, eagerly anticipating all the beautiful fat she'd pile on once everything digested, especially just how BIG her butt would be. As well as eagerly anticipating how she and her partner would continue to satiate her burgeoning appetite...

Judy would wake up eagerly the next morning, spending all night digesting, to find...
1221211222121221.title: "I'm completely okay with this."

choices: "I'll wear it for now and get a new one at the station."
"Maybe I'll ask Nick to bring me a new uniform."
12212112221212211.content:
As she got out of bed and was still in her undies, she looked at the mirror and realized how fat she has gotten from eating 3 wolves and a tiger. She was now looking like she could compete with the weight of Clawhauser or a hippo. In fact, her cheeks and jowl started to resemble that of Clawhauser. Her belly was still massive, looking like it could fit another 3 wolves as it was only a few centimeters from touching the ground. Judy then patted her belly and it jiggled a bit.

"Well, it looks like plenty of my breakfast, lunch, dinner, and dessert stayed here," Judy said to herself. "But...." Judy then turned around to look at her butt in the mirror. ".... a lot of it went right here." The bunny said with a grin on her face.

A lot of the weight really did went to her butt. Her hips and butt were humongous. Wide enough to take up the whole back seat in the cruiser and enough to compete with a hippo. As she felt up her butt a bit, she was surprised by how doughy it was. She also realized how tight her panties were getting. Clearly, she had too much junk in the trunk.

"Looks like I'm gonna need to buy some new panties soon." The bunny said as she pulled the sides of her panty straps. "But then again, with the way I'm going, I might outgrow those too." She then let go of the straps. "No doubt everyone is gonna be calling me Judy Hipps even more now. Not that I will mind it. You know what they say "If you got it, flaunt it."

Judy then gave a little wiggle. To be so fat, you surprisingly mobile showed that had quite some strength in those hips of hers. She could probably be even better at her job now. As she picks up her uniform, she remembers that after her meals, it wasn't exactly wearable.

"
12212112221212211.title: A lot to the gut... and the butt.

choices: "Weasels sound tasty. Let's go for them."
"Sheeps and Rams that worked for Bellwether? Let's take care of them."
"I could go for a whole polar bear."
122121122212122111.content:
Judy had to get another uniform from the station. She was also hoping for one that could that would fit her and her massive bunny girth.

Still, wearing a torned uniform seemed... unprofessional. Also, the new weight didn't really fit her as she tried pulling up her pants past her big bunny buns. Maybe she could wear a ZPD shirt and some sweatpants. Sweatpants are stretchy afterall

So, putting on a pair of sweatpants and a black ZPD shirt that exposed her belly, Judy went, or in most cases, waddled to the ZPD to meet up with Nick.

Not surprising, the bunny was getting a bunch of comments from other mammals about her new thickness. She didn't seem to mind it. Judy then walked up with Nick. Like everyone else, Nick had to make a comment about her Nick.

'My, look at you, Officer 'Hipps'." The fox said with a sly grin. He then circled around Judy. "Looks like those meals of yours went to all the right places."

"Don't I know it?" Judy commented. "Now, if you would excuse me, I need to get a get a new uniform for all this."

As Judy walked over to the locker room, Nick grinned as he said "Make sure to go up one or two extra sizes. You might need it today."

As funny as Nick's comment was, he had a point. Might as well pick a size that will accommodate you especially if she was intending to down more criminals.

After putting on a better fitting version of her uniform, Judy and Nick went on their patrol. Nick drove as Judy rode into the backseat due to her size.

"So Carrots, who are we catching today? Or rather, who's on the menu?" Nick asked knowing that her partner was probably hungry.

Judy's belly then growled loudly in hunger. After spending the whole time digesting everything, she had nothing but empty belly.

"Who do you have in mind?" Judy asked.

"We have a small group of weasels that have been using counterfeit money Downtown, a group of sheep and rams that might be part of a group that helped Bellwether in the Rainforest District, or a large polar bear that's a druglord in Tundratown." Nick said. "We got proper leads to each of them."

Judy was hungry enough for all of them. But that might be going overboard.
122121122212122111.title: Get another uniform from the station.

choices: "On second thought, fight and gulp is good enough."
1221211222121221112.content:
"If there are sheep and rams do worked for Bellwether, then odds are, they are gonna try causing the same situation as before." Judy stated to her partner.

"Then we should take care of them before they start another Nighthowlers case." Nick said.

"Do you know how many of them are there?" Judy asked.

"Most likely, 4 or 5." Nick said. "Think you can handle it?"

"After 3 wolves and tiger yesterday, it will be no problem stuffing them all right in here." Judy said confidently as she poked at her belly. It then let out a growl. "Also, I have not eaten."

"Just try not to go overboard. You just got a new uniform and you still need to fill in it. As well as this car. As well as your apartment." Nick stated with a grin.

"Problems for later." Judy stated.

"Okay then." Nick said as he continued to drive. "Anyway, I got a lead from the street, so I should know where they are."

"Then let's go." Judy said sounding eager.

Some time later, Nick and Judy went down under to the city's abandoned underground train station. It was close to the last place when they were at when they saved the Nighthowlers case. They even found an abandoned train cart that was being used. They weren't really original.

Nick and Judy peered at the window of the train cart. The set up was a lot like the old one, but with way less equipment and no nighthowlers have been grown yet. Like Nick said, there were 5 of them. 3 sheep, 2 white and 1 black, and 2 rams, both grey. All males.

Judy and Nick couldn't hear what they were talking about, but they were differently up to no go. It was clear that they intended to finish what Bellwether started. They were not going to let that happen.

"Doesn't look like they have Nighthowlers yet." Judy whispered to Nick.

"So, what's the plan, Carrots?" Nick whispered back.

"I was thinking go in, fight, and.... gulp." Judy told said.

"Think we need a better plan than that." Nick stated to Judy.

"Fine. I got two others. We can take out the lights by cutting the powercord." Judy said while pointing at a box by the train. "You have night vision, so you can take advantage of it and take them out. And then I'll have them for take-out."

"Kay. What's the other one?" Nick asked.

"Try to lure them out one-by-one. You stun them and I gulped them til they are all in here." Judy said as she lifted up her belly.

"Okay. Which plan do you want to do?"
1221211222121221112.title: "Sheeps and Rams that worked for Bellwether...

choices: "Honestly? It put me in a...playful mood~" (the two of them get frisky [lewd])
"I feel hungry for lunch~" she said. Nick laughed, "I was hoping you'd say that"
12212112221212211121.content:
Judy weighed her options, idly licking her lips as she scanned her upcoming meal... Usually, her greatest asset in combat had been her small size, high speed, and agility.

But looking at the immense pile of dough she'd managed to grow into, she realized that running in and fighting wasn't a great first instinct. Though, considering how utterly consumed in thick layers of lard her little legs were, 'running' would've been a generous term.

She thought that luring them out might've been a safe bet, but she didn't like the idea of them being stunned. Unconscious was more easy, but feeling the struggling was part of the thrill of it!

"Alright...Let's go for cutting the lights- once they're in the dark, you go in. I'll assume position just outside the door at the end of the traincar." Judy said, smirking up at Nick- her pudgy face being squished by the ring of gently wobbling neck fat she sported. "Once you're in, push 'em out the back of the traincar- try and aim for my mouth."

Nick chuckled, the bunny still so much shorter than him despite ballooning outwards so much in all directions but up. "Try and open wide- I'm sure it'll be a hard target to miss~" he teased, before slinking off to the power box. Judy followed, shifting her considerable mass from paw to paw, surrounded by the satisfying feeling of all that heavy body fat of hers sloshing with each methodical, lumbering step.

Once she'd reached the spot just outside the traincar's closed back door, she let out a soft sigh of relief- Walking was tough for such a heavy bun. Judy took a seat right there, her pillowy, comfy butt having grown so fat it made a pretty good beanbag chair- the bunny able to kick out her paws and lean back a bit, feeling the fat folds on her back bunch up against her head like a pillow.

Once she'd made herself nice and comfortable for a nice big meal, she turned to Nick, giving him an affirmative thumbs up with her pudgy little digits. Receiving confirmation from his partner, Nick eagerly ripped out a fistful of wires- all the lights in the traincar going out instantly. Amidst the confused bleats of the car's occupants, Nick slipped silently inside through a window. And Judy excitedly opened up her mouth- tongue out, slightly salivating with anticipation...

One of the white sheep came tumbling out first- his back facing Judy as he fell onto her, a ludicrous amount of fat cushioning his fall. Before he could wonder what it was he landed on, Judy's fat little fingers closed around his muzzle, the blubbery bun grunting a bit as she yanked him closer- wrapping her lips around his face.

Tingling with glee as he failed aimlessly, Judy would reach out her short little pillowy flabby arms as far as she could, grabbing mittfulls of fleece and pulling him up, shivering with every gulp as she felt the pressure in her throat, letting out a low, satisfied belch after he finally fully slipped down her gullet, and reappeared as a visible bulge in her gut.

Almost on queue, one of the rams tripped out- falling flat on his face on top of her. She didn't even have to pull him in this time- his snout managed to land perfectly in her awaiting maw. Joyfully gulping him down- letting her fat arms lay lazily on her love handles, Judy successfully swallowed up his head, shoulders, waist, hips, legs, and hooves in six beautifully smooth gulps.

The black sheep was next- somehow he'd fallen out legs first, allowing Judy to just grab him by the ankles and shovel his hooves down her throat. Desperately trying to claw his way out, his blunt hooves digging into her soft flab repeatedly only tickled- the bunny giggling profusely in between swallows.

Her gut was already noticeably bigger, three sheep being a bit more all together than three wolves, her belly had gone from soft and doughy to rotund and firm. But the food didn't stop then- out came the second white sheep- bouncing off her belly and landing arm-first in her maw. This was a new one, but Judy rolled with it- simply using both pudgy hands to force him inside her, bending his neck in quite an uncomfortable way as he shimmied frantically like a fish out of water.

Last of all, the second ram- who Judy was surprised to see Nick fall out with. It seemed the ram was putting up more of a fight than the others, and Nick had had to tackle him full on to get him out. The two landed on top of Judy- still locked in combat- Nick with his paws around the Ram's throat as its hooves repeatedly punched him in the shoulders, trying to make him let go.

After a moment, Nick realized that they'd both fallen out- Looking up in surprise...before smirking wickedly as he realized how close they were to Judy's face. With a burst of energy, he shoved the ram's head back, right at Judy's face.

Enthusiastically opening wide, Judy made quick work of the final ram- her fat arms again resting on her folds, as Nick did all the work to push the struggling ram down her throat- her belly bloating out far enough to press against the train now, a great round firm ball which was just as big, if not bigger, than the rest of the obese bunny (which, considering the size of her butt, was an impressive size for anything).

After being filled up so much so fast, Judy couldn't stop herself from letting out a long, loud, reverberating belch- Accidentally hitting Nick directly in the face, the force of hot air washing over Nick, blowing his ears back like a stiff wind.

Judy huffed and puffed- worn out from the shock to her system of ingesting so much at once- But horrified and embarrassed at what she'd just done.

"huff...huff...oh my gosh- Sorry! I'm...wheeze...I'm really sorry- I didn't mean to- it just sorta-" her already flushed red face managed to blush an even brighter shade, as her apology was cut off by Nick, reaching out and grabbing hold of her soft, chubby cheeks, leaning in quickly as he pulled her doughy features close, and instantly locked lips with the bloated blob of blubber.

Judy's eyes widened as she tensed up- before they fluttered shut, the overstuffed obese rabbit melting into her own enormity as she began to kiss her partner back.

Soon enough, the fox leaned back, panting himself. He glanced over his shoulder at the firm gray orb of her belly, furiously jostling with her prey inside. Nick gently prodded it with his toes, promoting one of the shapes to violently kick and yell. Judy herself emitting an adorable, muffled giggle.

He turned back to her, smiling widely himself. "Well...." He said, "I'd say planning ahead paid off, huh?" Judy chuckled, "In spades." She agreed, lovingly caressing the top part of her overfilled belly with her soft fatty fingers, similarly massaging the underside with her round fatty toes.

Nick leaned back, propping himself up against the engorged bun's belly, his rump finding a seat squarely between her overfattened breasts, as he lounged with his legs kicked out, wrapping around her neck fat, paws touching the crest of her back flab as he playfully used his own toes to tickle her tall ears. "So carrot-cake," he asked with a smile, trying out a new nickname more appropriate for her figure, "how'd you feel about your breakfast?"

Judy licked her chops, playfully swatting away Nick's feet from her ears with a doughy arm, before responding...

12212123.content:
It took a bit of effort, but Judy managed to get the wolf out of her stomach. She was tired.

The wolf however, seemed to be recovering more quickly. "You, you're not going to get away with what you did." He then grabbed her, and slammed her against the wall. "Did you have fun? Well, I'm going to-"

"Put her down, now!"

The wolf turned his head. "What are you going to do?"

Judy looked over the wolf's shoulder, and saw Nick standing a few feet away. "Nick!"

"Take it easy Judy," said Nick. "I got this."

"Do you know what she did to me?" the wolf growled.

Nick grinned. "At least she let you out. Not bad for someone who was Untrained. Me, I'm a Class 5."

The wolf gulped, and let Judy go. "Alright. Just don't eat me!"

"On your knees, and paws behind your head," said Nick.

The wolf got down on his knees. Judy could see the fear in his eyes as Nick walked up to him.

"Behave," Nick said, as he cuffed the wolf behind his back. "Get up." He looked over at Judy. "Think you can stand?"

"I'll try," said Judy, as she tried to stand. She felt a little wobbly. "Might need some help."

Nick dashed over, and helped her up. "Easy Carrots."

"Do you know what just happened?" Judy asked.

Nick nodded. "You're a Gulper."

"A Gulper?" Judy asked. "I thought that those were just myths. I mean, stories about predators who could swallow prey whole, that's mostly fiction, right? I mean, I could see how something the size of a lion, or tiger, or bear could swallow something the size of a mouse, but, the rest of-"

"Judy, you just swallowed a wolf, and vomited him up," said Nick. "I hate to burst your bubble, but Gulpers are real, and you're one of them."

"But, it's still impossible," said Judy.

"Carrots, I'm a Class 5 Gulper myself," said Nick. "I know what I'm talking about. Now, let's get this guy to the car, take him to the station, and talk to Bogo about this."

"Are you sure about that?" Judy asked. "Can't we just keep quiet about this?"

"No unless you want every other Gulper after you," said Nick. "You have to be Registered, and Trained, and then there's the dietary changes needed. Special protein and vitamin bars and pills, so that you don't lose control, and still have all the nutrition you need."

"You're serious?" Judy asked.

"Gulper stuff is one thing I wouldn't lie about," said Nick.
12212123.title: Judy's a Gulper

122121231.content:
Judy sat in the seat as Nick drove. "I've heard the stories, but I thought that those were pure myths. Old propaganda stuff, from back when Carnivores hunted down Herbivores. You know, to terrify children in to behaving - don't be mean to your siblings or a Gulper will get you. Eat the greens or a Gulper will get you. Do your homework or a Gulper will get you. That sort of stuff."

"There are days that I wish it was just a myth," said Nick. "But, I know all about it, first hand."

"What did you mean about being a Class 5?" Judy asked.

"There's a ranking system, usually between 1 and 5, with five being the highest," said Nick. "It's a matter of how big the Gulper is, compared to the size of the, for lack of a better word, Meal. The bigger the Meal compared to the Gulper, the higher their rank. Class 1 is Same Size Meal and smaller. As for someone like me, let's just say that an elephant could easily end up in my stomach. You, you're at least a Class 2."

"Then, why haven't I heard about this before?" Judy asked. "I mean, you could have Gulped down-"

"Remember that time you thought that I might attack you after that conference?" Nick asked. "Imagine if you knew then what you know now."

Judy sighed. "I see. So you, and other Gulpers just keep quiet about it to everyone else?"

"Ideally," said Nick. "But, we do have to Register, and go through training."

"Why?" Judy asked.

"So that we know how to control ourselves," said Nick. "Remember when I 'bit' your neck?"

Judy nodded.

"If I had been hit by the real thing, you would have vanished into my stomach," said Nick. "On the plus side, Bellweather probably would have followed soon after, along with those dirty sheep cops. Still, if I didn't regain control of myself, and get you out, you'd have died."

Judy gulped. "I see. What about my family?"

"They'll be tested," said Nick. "It usually occurs in families. Scientists think it's genetic, but they aren't too sure what causes it."

"But, what if they don't have it?" Judy asked.

"Then you might find out some truths your family didn't tell you, like you being adopted," said Nick. "But, there's just me talking. Sometimes it just happens. Never heard of a bunny being a Gulper though, or any Herbivore for that matter."

"What about him?" Judy asked, pointing at the wolf sitting behind them.

Nick grinned. "Let's just say that, in addition to stealing jewelry, he also owes Mr. Big a lot of money. Oh, and just to let you know, two of his polar bear guards would have no issues making him disappear if he decided to blab about it." He looked back at the wolf. "I hope you understand."

The wolf nodded, fearfully.

Finnick lifted his head from the hard metal, and realized he had fallen asleep again. Living inside the back of his van had robbed him of his natural daylight and the sleep cycle that came with it. He was living off of stored, borrowed, and poorly-stolen means since his setup-man, the fox who made all the action work, had switched over to The Fuzz.

If he were even a scintilla more spiteful he could allow his frustration to well over his feelings for his old friend, but knowing Nick's newfound happiness lit up the big heart in the fennec's little body. He looked down; he had fallen asleep inside his elephant costume again.

Why did he keep it? He had other, more and better, infantile costumes. But what can a little lost child take from someone on his own? Everything had depended on his partner, but it was his idea to use the elephant costume he owned since--

--had he always had the elephant suit? He stretched with waking and recollection, and waddled among the dwindling of his unsold, un-pawned possessions. He'd need to get food, find some way to steal himself through another day, as he sprung up to the top of the bookstack that gave him vision over the driver's seat. Backing up out of the alley, and proceeding into the day, the thoughtlessness of driving allowed him the simple clarity to arrive at the answer.

It was matter of fact, a declaration.

He loved his elephant suit so much because--

1552112.content:
if Finnick was to prove he was not an animal of small appetites, then he would not start out small.

This was Zootopia, after all. "Try Everything" would quickly take a new meaning for his stomach. If he had his way, he'd eat this entire city.

The van pulled up to the alleyway behind Jumbeaux's. Still wearing his little toot-toot costume, he pulled it up over his head and entered in through a back door.

Unnoticed, of course. Who would notice a runt like him? Late in the day the shop was closed, and sneaking between the back rooms on the floor, he found only Jumbeaux himself, counting the day's wages.

Finnick looked up at the massive beast before him, so many times bigger than himself, with a sense of rush in his heart. This was going to be impossibly amazing.

In a world of dumb, predatory and prey animals, he wouldn't have a change. He possessed no natural tools to defeat such a massive beast, but he had one simple little tool now; his brain.

This was an ice cream shop, that meant loads of coolants, refrigerants, in the compressors. He found some tubing, and hooked up a complex network of rubber hoses to leech fluorocarbons from the system. He tied the final tube into a slipknot, and climbed through the vents until he found the one just above Jumbeaux.

The elephant was big enough that there were mere inches between him and the ceiling. Finnick--his mouth covered by his costume--lowered the hose gently and undid the slipknot.

Jumbeaux precessed slightly in his chair like a spinning top losing power. He rubbed at his eye with the end of his trunk before looking around and yawning. mumbling something gently, he tried to stand up, but started breathing more heavily, much to his problem.

It took a moment for the elephant to weaken, and much much longer for the process to finally cause him to succumb, but the cold fluorocarbons washed over him with every large breath. Once the ball was rolling, it just picked up speed.

Jumbeaux crashed onto the floor with a weight that shook the building. Finnick tore through the ventilation shafts and turned on the fans, clearing the space of any debilitating gasses.

He opened the door to the back room, and saw his prey laying out on a pile of uncounted cash. Well, in for a penny, in for an entire day's receipts, why not, and Finnick took the contents of the till and the cash on the floor. An idea sparked, and he changed a few other receipts and the cash flow in the company records. If it worked, It would make it seem like Jumbeaux had embezzled and was likely to skip town. He even put a few travel sites in the elephant's search history.

Finnick looked over his meal, a mountain to the little fox. He felt so hungry, and so aroused by the prospect, he wanted to swallow him whole and live right now!

But the more sensible thing might be to quickly end him, and take him somewhere where he could be eaten over a long period of time piece by piece...

The vulpine's ears--previously his largest feature--perked up at the sound of the bell ringing, and in walked an elephant not much unlike the one Finnick had so recently digested. Shifting himself into a walking waddle, his stomach sloshing in front of him like a furry sack of gelatin the size of a rhino, he made his way to the front to meet with the new arrival.

"Jerry?" Shouted the pachyderm, turned towards the door to close it. "I got another pack of those trunk sleeves like you... Holy Herds!"

The elephant had turned towards Finnick and dropped a shopping bag from his trunk in surprise at such an immense mammal.

"Sup?" said Finnick, his already deep voice now resonating with the warm echo of his full body.

The elephant gathered the bag with one of his forelegs, and started sputtering "Uh, are you, you, um..."

"Is this how you treat all your customers?"

"Oh!" he interjected, taken aback. "I didn't think we were open yet, has Jerry already served you, um" his eyes darted momentarily to Finnick's bloated, gargantuan stomach "...anything?"

"No, he had to go to the back to get more for me." Finnick absent mindenly rubbed his belly, which already stuck out well beyond his tiny shirt. "But I do also want one of those, while we're waiting."

The massive fox pointed to a familiar giant red popsicle on the front display. The elephant employee was quickly, if nervously, assembling his work attire and donning his hat and trunk-sleeve. "Yes, well, normally we don't serve items that... size to mammals who we... don't think..."

Finnick put his hands as near to his waist as he could reach and leaned in, one eyebrow raised. "You don't think I'll be able to eat it all?"
