"A contest? For what?" the elephant asked.

"If you can eat a whole one of these popsicles before I can, I'll pay you double for what it costs. I'll even never come back, if that's what you want. BUT, if I finish mine first, I get mine for free. Deal?"

Finnick leaned forward, his weight supported by the undercurve of his stomach, and extended his paw. The elephant considered this, looked him up and down, and seemed hesitant; who had ever seen a fox this size? But still, he couldn't possibly eat too fast, with a mouth that size. The elephant extended a trunk into Finnick's paw, and shook it. "Deal."

Finnick still had a supply of the knockout drug he had used on Jumbeaux, not enough for a long sleep, but enough, in a vial in his bowling shirt's chest pocket. The waiter-elephant took one popsicle from the display and handed it to the fox. Then, while the elephant bent down to get a second one, he quickly dug for it. Momentarily losing his paw into the folds of his massive new bulk, he retrieved the vial and dosed the very tip of the popsicle.

"Hey!" barked Finnick at the site of the second popsicle in the server's grasp. "You think I need some kinda handicap, taking the bigger one for yourself? Give it here!"

The elephant shrugged off an argument about them being the same size, and switched popsicles with the bloated fox. "On three, ready?" Finnick counted down, "One, Two, THREE"

The two ate furiously fast, Finnick's smaller sharp-toothed mouth keeping up with huge swallows of icy cold fruit flavored treat. He watched side-eyed as the elephant ate the dosed tip of the popsicle, and from then he had already won. But it would be nice to win both ways.

Finnick knew a trick, and when the server's eyes started to screw up and close tight to fight off the inevitable brain freeze, Finnick made sure to rub the roof of his mouth with his tongue feverishly to create friction and heat, staving off the cold from his sinuses. In a few huge gulps, gigantic swallows that bulged out the foxes throat as it sloshed into his gut making it grow another few inches in front of him, he grew even bigger and his stomach started to groan and slosh with its contents.

The vulpine dropped his bare popsicle stick onto the counter just as the server was swallowing his last bite. "Well, I'll be." said the elephant. "I guess you can handle one after all. How did you get to be so big?"

Finnick smiled at the question. The drug was having an effect, although the sugar and full belly would slow it down, it would still work, just after a period of prolonged loopiness on the part of the pachyderm.

"I eat," he said, baring all his teeth. The fox rubbed his stomach, what he could reach, while the elephant walked around the counter. "This thing is always hungry and I love stuffing more and more into it, I eat and eat and eat." Finnick lifted up his massive gut, and let it fall to the floor, making the whole building shake like a deep bass thump.

"I can see that, can I...?" he reached out a fore foot, his eyes blinking very slowly, as the stupor caught on.

"Go ahead," said Finnick, presenting his massive stomach.

"You're just so big," said the server, rubbing the massive bare sand-furred gut with first his feet, then his trunk, and eventually his head. "So soft and warm like a massive warm-water pillow, you're as big as an elephant, maybe bigger! how big could you... possibly... *Yaaaaawwwwn* geeett"

"You'll see, in a moment," were the last words the elephant heard before drifting off.

Finnick rubbed his hands together and licked his lips. He was still hungry, after all, and this second elephant looked delicious, now how was he going to manage to eat him?

Finnick looked around--well, there was enough food here, and elephants did need a bit of something to make them even tastier. He nimbly stripped the elephant of all his clothes, resembling what he had seen at the naturist colony on the edge of town. Looking around at what to do with the apron, hat, and other parts of his uniform, he shrugged and shoved them into his mouth, and swallowed them as one large bulge down his throat and into his stomach. He was going to digest them if he left them on, and this way, there was no evidence.

The vulpid managed impressive mobility for his newfound size, and turned over every massive bucket of ice cream on display, gallons of it, in rolled balls larger than he used to be, larger even than most mid-sized mammals. Eventually, all edible ice cream and dessert in a pile on the floor around this server, it resembled a sort of elephant banana split. All told, there was at least as much ice cream as elephant, perhaps more.

Finnick rubbed his paws together and licked his lips, running his drooling tongue over each individual sharp teeth. He opened his maw wide, a gaping visage to his cavernous throat if the elephant were conscious to see it. Again, he swallowed up the elephant, trunk first, his mouth parting over the giant leathery gray skinned beast as massive swallows drew him up into his throat.

With his new weight, Finnick found he could anchor himself better, and draw this elephant sundae more into him than pull himself around it. Still, altogether, the sweet desserts dripping off the pachyderm, It was more than the massive fox now weighed. He had to stuff in huge balls of ice cream along with each swallow of elephant, until eventually it all was swallowed and stuffed into his enormous gut.

He was absolutely massive now, the largest mammal in zootopia by a very wide margin. For all the fat that had accumulated around him, his stomach was bloated and stuffed so far he couldn't see over its horizon. He was as big as three elephants, now, and looked like he could grow bigger than the entire ice cream parlor.

"ohhh," moaned Finnick, his voice deepened more and full of pleasure. "Look at how fat you've made my big belly." He rubbed at what little he could reach of this two-elephant balloon in front of him, as it gurgled and sloshed with melted ice cream inside. It groaned in pleasurable digestion. "that's it, stomach," said the fox, "You just digest it all."

After a long while, Finnick's stomach finally digested everything and converted into more fat for his body. The furious Elephant who was driving the bus continued to mash on the horn, offended that some obese fox would dare to block his path. Furthermore, that fox would have the nerve to waddle right up! Like he was trying to get on the bus- He might not even fit! For being a fox, he was more than twice as fat as most of the elephants he would serve. No way would he let this punk into his bus!

Fortunately, that wouldn't be a problem. Finnick smirked as he knelt down, gripping the corner of the bus- blocking the exit with his lard. The driver blinked in confusion.

No way Finnick wanted to get into the bus with all those hoity toity elephants...he wanted the bus to get into HIM!

With an astonishing amount of strength, Finnick hoisted the corner of the bus- opening his maw as wide as he could. The elephants inside were stunned- tumbling out of their seats. The metal crunching between his determined tiny jaws, Finnick performed a feat of astonishing impossibility- Turning his head skyward and gulping the bus down, as if it were a fish.

In the aftermath of his feast, Finnick had bloated to a preposterous size- Towering, having consumed a meal easily twenty times as large as his previous two combined. He laughed loudly, licking his lips and patting his gargantuan midsection- Which still conformed to the shape of the bus, intact inside of him.

Looking around, Finnick hobbled off to a spot underneath an overpass, his paws cracking the cement with every mighty stomp- slumping against the support columns, and allowing his prized meal to digest, as he dozed off...

(Please look at the pictures in this gallery! See how BIG Finnick is at this point in the story https://imgur.com/a/Xc8TEL3 )

Waking up a few hours later, larger and rounder than he'd ever been in his entire life, Finnick grinned, laughing and flexing his arms triumphantly, as he gazed out over his enormity, delighting to feel the pavement crack between his toes as he stomped on it.

"Yes- Yes! This is what I'm talkin' about!!!" Finnick licked his chops eagerly. "Mmmm...I need more- Gotta find somethin' big enough for an appetite like mine! See how much BIGGER I can get!"

Even after consuming two elephants, all the ice cream in an ice cream parlor, and a giant bus loaded with 40 or so more elephants, Finnick wanted more. His monstrous appetite still wanted to be satisfied. The gargantuan fennec fox started to march with his tiny feet leaving cracks on the pavement.

The sun was close to setting. Meaning that it was about to be night time. With all the resting and digesting, Finnick had enough energy to go all night if he wanted to.

Finnick's large body not only took up most of the road, but made the ground shake with every stomp. Scaring off most mammals that were close. The behemoth fennec fox was grinning ear to ear. No longer a little fox, but the biggest mammal in the city. Heck, maybe the world.

"This is great. No more being a runt for me." Finnick thought happily. "Now what else can I stuff myself with?"

After gobbling a whole bus, to Finnick, the next should be a train. In some cases, trains are like buses. But on rails and waaaaay longer. So eating a train might be an even better meal than the bus. With the same strength that Finnick used with the bus, the first part of the train was swallowed up and the rest of the train would come as he pulled more of the train into his muzzle. The second cart went into his muzzle. Then the third cart. Then the fourth cart. With each cart that went inside him, his belly grew more and more. As was as starting to have the shape of some of the carts. After 25 carts, the train was finally all inside Finnick's gargantuan belly. It was like Finnick had eaten 25 more buses as his belly as his stomach was still comformed with the shape of the many carts of the train he just devoured.

Feeling several times bigger than before, Finnick felt prouder and prouder of his stomach. Seems that no matter how big something was, his stomach could handle it. Finnick pulled each cart into his maw and the went straight down to his belly. After 30 or so carts, the entire train joined Finnick's belly. After a bit....

Feeling like that massivenss, that power, feeling first envy then the excitement that it might be his soon.

His pants and shirt still clung as best as they could to him, but they were stretched over his now massive frame; his stomach was swollen and heavy in front of him, far enough that it nearly pressed against the other side of the van.

He had grown nearly as large as an elephant, his body massively larger. Maybe the size of a rhino, he thought, as he scratched the upper curve of his belly and belched so large it nearly broke his windows.

He stood up, his body having converted enough elephant into muscle that he remained mobile, and his head grazed the top of the interior cab. He had grown taller, he had grown in every way, his thighs thick, his arms larger around. He was wider, and felt every inch of his fur graze against the van.

15522.content:
The leopard--not an old cat but one that had seen middle age come and gone--scratched at a graying spot and sucked his bottom lip. "And... these really work?"

"Of course they work!" Duke Weaselton beamed his brightest, which was still dull. His eyes gave the appearance of being narrowed no matter how wide he opened them, and his smile never quite straightened out. His teeth seemed to be pointing in all directions as though preparing to flee at the next inevitable beating.

The weasel waved one paw slowly over a folding table strewn with flasks of bright, unnatural colors. Hastily slapped-on stickers made bright, shiny promises of youth, vigor, strength, and power.

"These are the kinda secrets that they" he leaned in and half-covered his mouth with the back of one hand in conspiratorial whisper, "Don't want you to know about. Big Pharma, you know, Monkeysanto and Glaxo-Smith-Feline. These are the things that can make a guy like you or me feel like a real predator again."

He realized as he said it he shouldn't. The 'or me.' Comparing the two of them was too much of a promise and he felt his customer building up walls, the leopard looking the little weasel up and down. A shirt that didn't fit, too much belly and too skinny at that. He was losing the deal now, and had to try one last hail mary to get him back.

"I mean, if it can make a guy like this," he gestured to himself, as he looked down, and rubbing the stomach that stuck out between high shirt and low pants, "Feel like a real predator, imagine what it could do for you."

Duke could feel it was about to work. The leopard turned this over in his mind and seemed to be badly resisting temptation. "Well," he said, and reached out a hand slowly, but looked up wide-eyed and frightened. He turned around in the quick and nonchalant way of the guilty, and strolled away at twice a normal walking pace.

Duke didn't need to turn around to know what was there. He sighed, defeated, and turned around to the cop car. He leaned on his table and said "Ain't you guys got any real bad guys to find you gotta keep pickin' on me?"

The window rolled down, the driver revealing themselves to be...
15522.title: Duke Weaselton

choices: Prepare one to offer to the cops
155221.content:
The rabbit looked at him through mirrored shades. "Hello, Wesselton," she said as though twisting a knife with a sideways grin to match her partners.

Duke could feel his claws come out as his arm muscles tensed. "It's Weaselton," he hissed quietly before releasing all his tension at once and re-applying his mask of calmness. "Now, what can I offer you this fine day?"

"We had some reports of a break in and stolen property down at this laboratory in Tundratown. We think some of the experiments may have been fenced on the black market."

"And I," said Nick, leaning across his partner's lap to try and stick his head out the window, "Heard from a few friends of mine about someone promising predators a way to feel all fangy and feral again, eh? So why don't we take a look at whatever it is you're pawning off on the unsuspecting today."

Duke's smile remained frozen as his eyes widened and shift in quick-thinking panic. While the two officers were distracted parking and getting out of their car, the weasel quickly turned to his supplies and...
155221.title: Judy, with Nick in the passenger side

1552211.content:
The window rolled upward, Judy's face replaced with Duke's own mirror reflection. In an instant, he took the bottles and disposed of them the only place currently available; his own belly. He drank greedily from the bottles, several at a time, stinging astringent chemical flavors all at once in huge gulps down his throat, and replaced the empty bottles onto his table and resumed his previous position in one lightning fast motion.

Judy had exited and Nick came round the other side of the vehicle. Duke looked to each, nonchalantly, then to his wares. "See there, coppers, nothing illegal about some fine hand-blown imported glass, now is there?"

Nick lowered his mirrored shades to glance over them as Judy picked one up. "And where did you get these?"

"They fell off the back of a truck. That fell of the back of a train."

"And I suppose," said Judy, swishing a tiny amount of green liquid collecting at the bottom of one of the vials, "You found them like this? ALMOST empty?"

"Well, I may have poured out whatever was in them," he said, slightly taken aback by his own twisted honesty. "But If you're done harrassing me, I'd like to get back to my own legitimate buUUUUUURRRRP"

The belch took everyone by such surprise, and blew the two cops back a little bit. With wide eyed expressions of shock, Nick retrieved the glasses blasted onto the top of his head and Judy cleaned out her ringing ears. Then they all looked down.

Duke's stomach was bloated, a sphere the size of the weasel's own head gently hung out of the top of his pants. As Duke stood up straight and assessed his body, his stomach shifted slightly in a heavy, liquid slosh.

Nick and Judy looked to each other in an almost sarcastic manner.

"Ah heh heh heh," Duke laughed without mirth, "You see, I can explain, what this," he pointed to his stomach "Is, is, um... just a big--

--lunch," he said, from the back of the cop car. He grumbled to himself the ride through the downtown district on the way to the ZPD headquarters when he feels a shifting in his stomach, and feels something coming on him. "Uh, guys," he says, trying to get his captors attention but to no avail, as his stomach shivers and shakes, a movement spreading throughout his body, when suddenly
1552211.title: Drank them all

choices: Duke is still hungry, and leaves the car to find more.
15522111.content:
Duke grabbed his slight paunch of a belly with both hands as it quaked angrily, a noise so loud and a vibration so fierce it caused the officers to skid over to the side of the road, eventually parking in a dark alley to turn around in unison.

"What the..." said Nick, lowering his sunglasses to stare at Duke's stomach.

"I don't know... this hunger... I can't control it!" said the squirming weasel, before his fangs dripped and his eyes went wild, and he leapt at the fox.

A hand with previously unknown strength grabbed at Judy while Nick slid past his lips and teeth, the fox going face-first streamlined down the weasel's long, wet throat. His heartbeat pulsed in the fox's ears, his face wincing while he pathetically attempted to writhe. In just a few swallows nothing but a pair of long feet and a huge bushy tail were outiside his mouth, the tail flailing wildly side to side. With his free hand Duke pushed the feet and tail in, and one last deep swallow filled his gut with fox.

Judy panicked as she visible saw the surface of Duke's stomach kicking, the soft fur parting and weaving left and right as her partner tried to free himself from within. Duke turned her to his face and grinned with all his teeth, licking them to get them wet again, and shoved her in after as one giant soft furry morself.

He swallowed her in one lump, squeezing through his throat and landing down in his gut, on which he lazily placed his hands.

His stomach was larger now than the rest of him put together, and he couldn't reach the far edge of it. It rested somewhere closer to between his haunches than up his tube-like form; it was so heavy, and weighed on him even sitting splay-legged in the back seat.

He leaned against the inner car door and belched loudly, hiccuped, and belched again, proudly patting his gut.
15522111.title: His stomach rumbled with an intense hunger

155221112.content:
Duke ambled out of the alley and stretched his arms above his head. If this were a smaller town, a town of question and connection, then his swollen gut would've caused people to think of him twice. In a town where anyone can and often is anything, people leave each other alone, and in Zootopia, whatever that weasel's stomach was, was someone else's problem.

He loved feeling it proceed him, his pants clung to the underside of it as it looked twice as large as the rest of his body put together, jutting out from just under his short-cropped tank top. It bounced ahead of him, and every muffled writhe from within sent pleasure throughout his body.

He idly put his hands on it as he walked along, an impossible-to-stifle grin flittering across his face as each wave of pleasure from his massive gut down there flew up into his brain.

His prey was powerless to his body, no matter how much he writhed.

Well, those drinks must've been powerful, because his predatory stomach was not yet sated, and he could feel his body wanting more. He knew where he could find a wonderful new meal, and walked all the way to...
155221112.title: Duke is still hungry

choices: I'd like to eat--uh, meet, with Chief Bogo.
I'd like to eat--uh, speak, with you in private.
1552211121.content:
Duke reached out to push open the door when he felt the cold glass press up against the far side of his stomach; his swollen belly was so far in front of him that he had to use it to swing the doors to the station open.

The sudden press of cold reinvigorated his prey, which shifted left and right, making him lose balance momentarily, looking like a dancing figure being controlled more by his belly. But with a sudden spin and a plant of his feet he was again upright, and looking up and just barely over the front desk where that giant cheetah was filling out paperwork and working his way absent-mindedly through his second box of donuts.

"Ahem," said the weasel, "Excuse me, but uhh, I'd like to report a crime, if that's ok."

Clawhauser glanced around then down at Duke, then Duke's stomach, then Duke again.

"Well, if it ain't a turnup for the books for you to turn up. What, you want to admit to stealing whatever you've got hidden in there?"

"Something like that. But as for my confession..."
1552211121.title: The police station

15522111212.content:
"Well, I'm really only the desk clerk, but... Harold?" Clawhauser called out to an elephant currently filling a to-him tiny paper cup with water from a water-cooler. The pachyderm looked up. "Can you cover my desk for a moment? I have someone here an' he wants to fill out a confession if it's with me."

The elephant nodded his head, and stomped over to the desk while Clawhauser lead Weaselton down a side hallway. As Harold sat down, he spilled his tiny water onto his shirt. He rolled his eyes and released a small trumpeting sigh from his trunk.

Duke's belly continued to kick as Nick and Judy struggled within him. Clawhauser lead him to a dark, grey room with nothing but a table, an overhanging lamp, two chairs and a file cabinet. Duke struggled with his belly sloshing left and right to sit into the chair but ultimately made it. His stomach entirely under the table, he looked relatively unchanged above it. But it gurgled and moaned as it struggled to digest his two prey.

Clawhauser hummed and wiggled his hips as he sorted through the paperwork on the filing cabinet, eventually coming back and laying a few sheets and a pencil in front of the weasel.

"Just fill out this form with every detail you can, and then sign it there on the last page. If you need more pages let me know." He then produced seemingly from nowhere a chocolate-glazed donut.

Duke's stomach roared with hunger, loud enough that Clawhauser couldn't ignore it. "Heh, you can't still be hungry after whatever it is you ate, now, can you?"

"I have an enormous appetite," said Duke, smiling a crooked grin.

"Well, I'll tell you what, you finish that paperwork and I'll let you have the rest of this donut all to yourself," he said, waving the pastry in front of Duke's nose.

The chubby cheetah had to reach across the table a bit to taunt Duke, so when the weasel quickly snapped up Clawhauser's hand, donut and all, and pulled back, the cheetah fell forward and onto the paperwork. It left him without much grip or position as he quickly flailed for a second.

Duke grabbed at Clawhauser's forearm and pulled, swallowing hard, and feeling the cat enter into him. There was a look of scrambling terror as Clawhauser realized what was happening and that he couldn't do much to stop it.

The weasel pulled again, and opened his mouth wider, saliva dripping from his hapscrabble fangs as the cheetah's face entered in too, and soon that huge blubbery mass was sliding down his throat. He shoved at the cat with his arms, shoving him down his gullet, until the whole mass of cheetah slid into his snake-like throat and down into his belly.

Clawhauser's tail furiously twitched outside Duke's grinning lips, as the weasel's eyes unfocused and he hiccuped. Still, for someone who couldn't see under the table, he looked normal, but under it was a writhing mass of three prey kicking and moaning as they tried in vain to escape.

Duke felt he could just sit there now and digest them all...
15522111212.title: I'd like to eat--uh, speak, with you in pri...

choices: Call it a day and enjoy his spoils. The red light district could use a twink~
He’s still hungry for more cops!
155221112121.content:
...and so he did. He closed his eyes and let his massive stomach do its job as he laid back on the chair he was on.

His gut was big enough to reach the floor and cover a decent sized chunk of it, mostly due to Clawhauser, Nick and Judy taking up just below half the space he did.

Over time, however, the struggles of the three officers died down as his stomach began growing smooth until the weasel slept over a rounded orb of flesh, rather than a lumpy one.

Judy Hopps, Nick Wilde, and Benjamin Clawhauser were no more. There was only weasel fat.

When Duke woke up, his stomach had shrunken, but was still big enough to be noticeable, about his own size. The rest of his body had grown fatter to compensate, his face cheeks puffing out with pudge. His hips had widened and his butt had grown massively. Now he had soccer ball sized butt cheeks, which for his body, was quite big.

He rubbed his big belly and belched out saliva and acid caked fur and badges, chuckling to himself as he thought of what to do now...
155221112121.title: Hours later with some digestion...

Bogo shoots Duke with a Tranquilizer dart, and doctors perform surgery.

155221112122.content:
That was when the door opened, and Duke saw Chief Bogo looking at him, his arms crossed in front of his chest.

"I'm not quite sure what eating my officer would be counted as exactly, but I do know that it includes, at the very least, assault of an officer, and attempted murder of an officer," said Bogo as he entered the room, and moved the table. "And by the looks of your gut, there's at least one other person in there."

"That dumb rabbit and that stupid fox," said Duke. "They should have known not to mess with me."

Bogo's eyes narrowed. "And you should have known not to mess with my officers."

Duke sneered. "What you going to do about it?"

"This!"
155221112122.title: Chief Bogo to the Rescue

1552312.content:
A long dark car pulled up to the crossing station, where two blue-coated timber wolves looked cautiously at the paperwork of the driver. After examination and a nod between them, they solemnly let the vehicle proceed along the needle-thin bridge to the abandoned asylum, pulling around to a disused service entrance.

The car still rumbling and warm, a figure emerged from the passenger compartment. A thick bush of sand-and-fire mane betrayed him despite his hat and coat with its turned-up collar.

A honey badger in a labcoat was waiting anxiously at the entrance, tapping a clipboard in her hands. "You're late," she pleaded.

Mayor Lionheart put his waterfall-wettened coat and hat on a peg inside the entrance. "I'm here at all, Doctor. Be thankful. I have to handle this crisis both here and with a flash-charm-smile-handshake to the public. Thankfully nobody's connected the dots to anything other than seemingly unrelated disappearances but the more dots they have, the more they'll start to form a picture."

"Sir," said the badger, turning pages over on her board, "We've looked at everything and still nothing. We need some way of making these animals, well, disappear for good, if we're to contain this and save the city from tearing itself apart."

Lionheart looked down the containment cells at 14 different predators of various sizes, polar bear to otter.
1552312.title: At the compound, during the movie

15523121.content:
"Well," said Lionheart, a calm smugness across his demeanor, "I know of one way to make them all go away." He deftly uncuffed his sleeves and took off his jacket. "It's a good thing I skipped breakfast to come out here."

"Sir!" said the honey badger, wide eyed and looking him up and down as he continued to remove his clothes. "You can't possibly--"

"I'm a lion, doctor." He unbuttoned his shirt. "And lions are the top predator. We eat."

"But we have no way of knowing if the feral condition is... um... digestible?"

Lionheart gave this some thought.

"Have you shown any signs that the condition is transferrable, through contact with bodily fluids?" asked Lionheart

"No, sir, we don't have ANY information on--"

A cell phone ring shattered the quiet, echoing off the walls. The two looked up with alarm.

"Sir, it isn't safe, you have to get out of here!" said the doctor. She took Lionheart's paw and started to lead him.

He pulled his paw away, his brow furrowed, his lion pride wounded. "Whoever is in here isn't safe, from me." He stomped in the direction of the vacant cell and slid the door open. Cowering behind the toilet were the new rabbit officer Judy Hopps and some scruffian fox character.

The fox was first to speak, with a well-oiled tone he pleaded "Nice place you got here! Lovely rustic feel, we'll be sure to rate it 5 stars on the we-didn't-see-you-and-you-didn't-see-us-dot-com app, huh? Whaddaya say?"

Lionheart grabbed both of them by the neck.

"That's another no," said Nick.

Judy's phone clattered to the floor, the screen cracking, as Lionheart held them both up. The Doctor quickly picked it up. "Sir," she asked, "What are you going to do with them?"

155231231.content:
Lionheart's gaze lingered on the pair of diminutive animals in his grasp as he considered Dr. Badger's question. His baritone voice echoed in the stone-and-metal laboratory, "You know Madge, it's getting late. Why don't you head on home?" There was a fateful tone to the question that didn't leave any room for argument, but the honey badger raised a hand plaintively nonetheless before Lionheart cut her off, "Now, Madge. I'll take care of this, and we'll talk again tomorrow morning."

She gave the two tremulous trespassers a pitying look, "As you say, it's... it's getting late. I'll leave you to it then." Tapping her clipboard nervously, she turned on her heel and shuffled back down the long hallway to exit the lab.

Judy, who had been silent up until now, seemed to summon up her courage as she dangled in Lionheart's grasp, hands tugging at the massive paw around her throat, "Mayor, sir, put us down. I am an officer of the-hrrk!" She was silenced abruptly as the immense lion tightened his grip, choking her slightly, his calm demeanor all the while unwavering.

"I know who you are, 'Officer' Hopps. If you'll remember, I was there when they pinned that badge on your chest." Lionheart sighed and closed his eyes, seemingly dismissive of Judy's scrabbling limbs as she struggled to breathe, "This outbreak has been an absolute mess, you know that? Predators going feral, returning to old hunting behaviors - it's downright apocalyptic." He opened his eyes again, and his expression slid into a smile. The kind of smile that raises the hairs on the back of your neck.

"There is one advantage though. Two little mammals, a scuzzy fox and an upstart bunny, can go missing pretty quietly in all of this, tragically devoured by a maddened citizen." His smile only widened as he watched Nick blanch with fear. "And don't worry Hopps, once this is all sorted out, I'll be there personally at your funeral. Full honors, I'm sure."

As both Nick and Judy now struggled in his vice-like grasp, Lionheart's belly gave a low rumble, "So, who wants to watch while the other goes first?"

With his small team, Leodore had ensure that no one had been injured by these predators. There were some close calls like one time when one of the predator, a tiger had been trying to eat someone.

They had been able to save the goat from being eaten but the goat had wanted to be eaten by the tiger and it had taken a bit of time but they were able to ensure that the goat didn't want to go down a predator's throat. During this time and his time in prison, Leodore had wondered about what that would be like to be either the one going down the throat or the one doing the swallowing. In the darkest moments, during the incident, Leodore had wondered if that might be the way to deal with the predators. He didn't mentioned it to his staff but the thought had not left him.

Hearing the guards starting to come around, Leodore finally got up from his bed as it was an important day today...

1552322214.content:
"Try everything," Gazelle sang, finishing her hit song.

The crown erupted in applause. Some flashed their cellphones, trying to get her to sing it, yet again.

"Thank you, and good night!" She headed off the back of the stage, closely followed by her backup dancers. There were a few fans, whom she signed autographs for.

Eventually, she got to her room, where she sat down. "What a crowd?! Three encores for that song alone!" She started to undo her shoes.

"Can you blame them?" one of the tigers asked, coming over, to help her out.

"I guess not, Jethro," Gazelle said, finally getting the one shoe off. "Still, my hooves are all but killing me."

"I guess we'll have to fix that for you," Jethro said, as he started to massage the gazelle's leg. "Sam, you get the other leg."

A second tiger came over, and started to undo Gazelle's other shoe, carefully massaging her.

"Anything else?" Jethro asked.

Gazelle smiled. "My shoulders could use Timothy's gentle touch."

The third tiger chuckled, came over, and began to work on Gazelle's shoulders.

"What about me?" the fourth tiger asked.

"Albert, a glass of white wine would be nice," said Gazelle.

"As you wish," Albert said, heading towards the fridge.

Gazelle looked at her co-stars. "I'm glad you stuck around during the whole scare."

Jethro chuckled. "We're just glad that you didn't get rid of us."

"What kind of friend would I be if I did that?" Gazelle asked.

"Not one I'd want," said Sam.

"Same here," said Timothy.

"Likewise," Albert said, coming back with a glass of wine.

Gazelle smiled. "I'm glad to know. I mean, we've been friends for years."

"The only issue I've ever had while working with you are those stupid tabloids that people publish about us," said Jethro.

"Those are annoying," Gazelle said, taking a sip. She then stood up, and walked over to a padded table, getting on it. "Now, Albert, the lower back. It's not easy swaying these hips around."

"Yes Gazelle."

Gazelle soon felt the tigers' hands upon her, once more. "You've all got good hands, and they make it possible for me to work."

"What about us?" Jethro asked.

Gazelle grinned. "You and Sam first, and then, after I rest for a bit, Timothy and Albert."

"Do you think that you can handle two of us at the same time?" Albert asked.

"I've had plenty of practice with my toys," said Gazelle. "One in the front, and one in the back, and we've have plenty of practice doing it Wild Style."

"We just don't want to hurt you," said Sam.

"We are pretty big, and heavy," said Timothy.

Gazelle chuckled. "Make sure to use plenty of lubricant then."

"Alright," said Jethro. "Sounds like fun."

The door made a pounding sound. "Gazelle? You in there?"

Gazelle groaned in annoyance. "I'm kind of in the middle of something, Vinnie!"

"It's nothing I haven't seen before," said Vinnie. "Open up!"

Gazelle glanced at one of the free tigers, who walked to the door, and carefully opened it.

In came a pig. He glanced at Gazelle and the two tigers she was between. "I guess you were in the middle of a tiger sandwich. Tell me that you used that one lubricant that I recommended?"

Gazelle chuckled nervously. "Yes."

"Good," the pig said, as he walked over to a table, and sat in a way that wasn't looking at her and the two tigers, as he got out the cash money from the concert. "I always recommend that stuff to anyone who hires me, and happens to be as sexually active as you five are. I remember this mouse that once hired me, Frank Mousinatra - he really got around with the ladies, and the bigger the better. During the time he had me, he was involved with this elephant - Ella Phanta or some such thing. One time I came in, he was into her, in a big way, and was more than a little stuck. Luckily, I had bought some of that stuff for my own personal use with this female I was seeing, and so I applied it to my hand, and I was able to slip it inside of Ella, and get Frank out of her. He gave me a Bonus for that."

Gazelle chuckled nervously. "I can imagine."

"That always seems to be the problem though - going through it without thinking through it," said Vinnie. He turned, and looked at the three, before glancing at the other two tigers, and then back to Gazelle. "I have no issues with mixed-species sex acts, so long as you realize that your body isn't going to be readily acceptable to the other person's anatomy."

"I've used plenty of toys to get myself ready," said Gazelle. "And I've had sex with all four of them before."

Vinnie chuckled. "Not really. You five have your fun. Just remember, she needs to be able to dance tomorrow morning." With that, the pig got up, and left the room.
